anya-e0807n:10_0: Yā satti pāṇine yā ca, candra+kātyāyanādisu;
anya-e0807n:12_0: Suttaṃ vutti ca teneva, katā ekena pañcikā;
anya-e0807n:14_0: Tamhi ca dubbidhaṃ ñeyyaṃ, suttaṃ kammatthabhedato;
anya-e0807n:19_0: Akārādayo niggahītantā tecattālīsakkharā vaṇṇā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n:19_1: Taṃ yathā a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, e, ऐ, o, औ,
anya-e0807n:19_7: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ.
anya-e0807n:20_0: Akāro ādi mariyādabhūto yesaṃ te aādayo.
anya-e0807n:21_1: “kasmā ācariyakaccāyanādīhi viya ekacattālīsakkharāna+makkharasañña+makatvā titālīsakkharānaṃ vaṇṇasaññā katā”ti. Vuccate –
anya-e0807n:24_0: Vacanato māgadhikānaṃ ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi-
anya-e0807n:24_2: neva pana ‘rukkhā vanaṃ’tyādo viya avayave samudāyavohāro,
anya-e0807n:24_3: ‘samuddo mayā diṭṭho’tyādo viya ca samudāye avayavavohāroti dassetuṃ paccekaṃ vaṇṇasaññā katāti.
anya-e0807n:25_0: “Sakkaccasavanaṃ buddhasāsanasampattī”ti “sithiladhanitādi akkharavipattiyañhi atthassa dunnayatā hotī”ti ca yasmā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:29_8: niggahītassa nāsikā, ṅa, ñña, ṇa, na,
anya-e0807n:32_0: Yathā avaṅhoti (avaṅa hoti., tañhi, taṇhā, pubbanho, amhe, guyhaṃ, gārayhā, ārulho, bahvakkharanti.
anya-e0807n:39_0: Evaṃ ṭhāna+karaṇa+payatana+suti kālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0807n:40_0: Nissayā+do sarā vuttā, nissitā byañjanā tato;
anya-e0807n:44_0: Aādīsvā+dimhi niddiṭṭhā odantā dasa vaṇṇā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n:44_1: Yathā a ā, i ī, u ū, e ऐ, o औ.
anya-e0807n:47_0: Aādīsvā+dimesu dasasu dve dve savaṇṇā nāma honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:47_1: Yathā a āiti, i īiti, u ū iti, e eiti, o, oiti.
anya-e0807n:49_0: Tesveva dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā,
anya-e0807n:49_3: Yathā a i u e o.
anya-e0807n:49_4: Tesu ‘saṃyogato pubbāva dissanti dve panantimā’ta dassetuṃ tattha sādhuttā tesampi idha saṅgaho,
anya-e0807n:49_7: Rassakālo nāma accharāsaṅghāto akkhinimmilanasaṅkhāto vā kālo,
anya-e0807n:51_0: Aādīsvā+dibhūtesu dasasu ye dve dve savaṇṇā,
anya-e0807n:51_3: Taṃ yathā ā ī ū e o.
anya-e0807n:53_0: Aādīsu kādayo niggahītapariyantā tettiṃsa byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n:53_1: Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa,
anya-e0807n:53_6: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ iti.
anya-e0807n:56_0: Aādīsu kakārādayo makārantā pañcapañcakā vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0807n:56_1: Yathā ka kha ga gha ṅa,
anya-e0807n:56_5: pa pha ba bha ma iti.
anya-e0807n:56_8: Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena kavagga+cavaggādivohāraṃ gatā kusalattikādayo viya.
anya-e0807n:62_0: Vaṇṇā sarā savaṇṇā ca, rassā dīghā ca byañjanā;
anya-e0807n:66_11: asanto ettha na dissanti itī+dha sarasaññāyaṃ –
anya-e0807n:68_6: tato vaṇṇa kāla byavadhāne kāriyaṃ na hoti, tva+masi,
anya-e0807n:71_11: Pubbassa kāriyavidhānā sattamīniddiṭṭhassa paratā+va gamyateti pareti paravacanampi ghaṭate.
anya-e0807n:72_12: pāto evātī+dha pubbassaralope sampatte “saro lopo sare” tveva.
anya-e0807n:74_0: Saramhā paro saro kvaci lopanīyo hoti.
anya-e0807n:74_18: “Vivakkhāto sandhayo bhavantī”ti ñāyā vatticchāpi idha sijjhati.
anya-e0807n:76_0: Tassa idaṃ, vāta īritaṃ, na upeti, vāma ūru, ati iva aññehi, vi udakaṃ itīdha pubbassaralope –
anya-e0807n:78_0: Luttā sarā paresaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ e+o honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Yathāsaṃkhyānuddeso samānānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:80_1: tena savaṇṇopi gayhati sayañca rūpaṃti īūnampi e+o.
anya-e0807n:80_2: Sabbattha rassassa jātiniddese dīghassāpi gahaṇatthaṃ ida+māraddhaṃ. Tassedaṃ,
anya-e0807n:80_5: Idañca pacchimodāharaṇadvayaṃ “avaṇṇe lutte eva e+o hontī”ti gāhassa nisedhanatthaṃ. Vātveva, tassidaṃ.
anya-e0807n:80_8: Pati urasminti vibhajja “yavā sare”ti yakāre “tavaggavaraṇā”dinā co,
anya-e0807n:81_6: su āgataṃ, su ākāro, du ākāro,
anya-e0807n:83_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāra+vakārā honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:84_2: te assa pahīnā pañca, te ahaṃ, ye assa, te ajja,
anya-e0807n:84_6: ahaṃ kho ajja, so ahaṃ, so ajja, so eva,
anya-e0807n:84_8: so ahaṃ itī+dha “yavā sare” “ve”ti ca vattate,
anya-e0807n:86_0: Eonaṃ yakāra+vakārā honti vā sare pare yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:86_1: “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti dīghe adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo,
anya-e0807n:86_3: tyāssa pahīnā pañca, tyāhaṃ, yyassa, tyajja,
anya-e0807n:87_0: Go eḷakaṃ, go assaṃ, go ajinaṃ itī+dha “sare”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n:89_1: Sa ca “ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbassā”ti sabbassa pasaṅge ‘antassā”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n:91_2: so anekavaṇṇopi antassa hotīti okārasseva hoti.
anya-e0807n:94_0: Evasadde pare itissa vo hoti vā. Sa ca –
anya-e0807n:99_0: Ete mayadā ca āgamā honti vā sare kvaci. Āgamino aniyamepi –
anya-e0807n:102_1: yakārāgameneva “nipajja”nti siddhe “padādīnaṃ kvacī”ti byañjanassa yukā+gamo niratthakoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n:102_57: pariyosānaṃ, niyāyogo. Udaggo, udayo, udāhaṭaṃ, udito, udīritaṃ, udeti, sakideva,
anya-e0807n:103_0: Cha abhiññā, cha aṅgaṃ, cha asīti, cha aṃsā, cha āyatanaṃ itī+dha “vā sare” “āgamo”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0807n:105_0: Chasaddā parassa sarassa ḷakāro āgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0807n:107_0: Ādeso nāma so yā tu, asantuppatti āgamo.
anya-e0807n:111_0: Pubbaparassarā dvepi vā kvaci na lupyante. Kaññā iva, kaññeva, kaññāva.
anya-e0807n:112_36: mantayi satthāti evamādayo idha kālabyavadhāneneva sijjhanti.
anya-e0807n:113_7: gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva,
anya-e0807n:113_34: su akkhāto, yo ahaṃ, so ahaṃ,
anya-e0807n:118_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa kvaci dve rūpāni honti.
anya-e0807n:118_1: Ettha ca āvuttidvivacanaṃ ṭhānedvivacananti dvīsu ṭhānedvivacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:119_21: Dhanakkīto, vikkayo, anukkayo. Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho,
anya-e0807n:119_23: diṭṭhiggāho. Pajjoto, vijjoto, ujjoto. Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0807n:121_0: Vatu+vaṭa+disāna+mante, yathā vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṃ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0807n:122_4: duccaritaṃ, nijjaṭaṃ, ujjahaṃ, uccaṅgaṃ, unnamati, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, nissāro. Takkaro, tajjo, tanninno,
anya-e0807n:123_1: abhibhuyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṃ, neyyaṃ, seyyo, jeyyo,
anya-e0807n:126_0: Catutthadutiyesu paresve+saṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti paccāsatyā.
anya-e0807n:126_5: niādīhi paresaṃ ghādīnaṃ dvibhāve tatiyapaṭhamā honti.
anya-e0807n:127_0: Rassasarehi paresaṃ vaggadutiyānaṃ dvibhāvo ce, paṭhamā.
anya-e0807n:130_0: Eonaṃ vaṇṇe kvaci a hoti vā.
anya-e0807n:130_12: “Na sandhisamāsā vaddhassā”ti vuttattā gāthāmajjhe sandhi na hotīti “tividhassā”ti vuttatimhi parepi vaṇṇo paro nāma na iti.
anya-e0807n:133_1: “Vaggalasehi te”ti pubbarūpaṃ. Accantaṃ, tacchaṃ, majjaṃ, bujjhati, dhaññaṃ, sebbo,
anya-e0807n:134_8: asa yate itī+dha “ye”ti vattate vakkhamānesu dvīsu.
anya-e0807n:136_0: Vaggalasehi parassa yakārassa kvaci te vaggalasā honti. Sakkate, ruccate, paccate, aṭṭate, luppate, kuppate, sallate, phallate, dissate, assate.
anya-e0807n:139_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti yakāre. Muyhati, guyhati.
anya-e0807n:140_0: Bahu ābādho itī+dha ussavakāre “hassa vipallāso”ti vattate.
anya-e0807n:142_0: Hassa vipallāso hoti vā vakāre. Bavhābādho. Vātveva, bahvābādho.
anya-e0807n:144_2: evaṃ sukaṭaṃ, patthaṭo, pataṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo.
anya-e0807n:144_4: Paṇidhānaṃ, paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṃ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, duṇṇayo, niṇṇayo, oṇato.
anya-e0807n:145_6: tata sabhāvato itī+dha “ve”ti vattate yāva “mayadā sare”ti.
anya-e0807n:147_15: vavatthitassa lakkhaṇassā+nurodhena lakkhaṇe pavattitā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā.
anya-e0807n:147_16: Vāsaddo hi atthadvaye vattate katthaci vikappe,
anya-e0807n:147_20: Ettha pana kvacisaddassā+nuvattanā tenevā+santavidhi siddhoti vāsaddeni+taradvayaṃ.
anya-e0807n:148_5: tassa adāsiṃ ahaṃ itī+dha “niggahītā”dhikāro ā “mayadā sare”ti.
anya-e0807n:151_5: kiṃ idāni, tvaṃ asi, idaṃ api,
anya-e0807n:153_0: Niggahītamhā parasarassa lopo hoti vā kvaci. Katanti,
anya-e0807n:153_5: sadisaṃva. Vāti kiṃ, kataṃiti, kimiti, dātumapi,
anya-e0807n:154_0: Pupphaṃ assā uppajjati, evaṃ assa te āsavā itī+dha parassaralope –
anya-e0807n:156_0: Abyavahitānaṃ dvinnaṃ byañjanānaṃ ekatra ṭhiti saṃyogo,
anya-e0807n:156_2: tassa vā kvaci lopo hotītiādibyañjanassa lopo.
anya-e0807n:159_0: Niggahītassa kho vagge vagganto vā hotīti nimittānussarānaṃ paccāsatyā tabbaggapañcamo hoti.
anya-e0807n:159_1: Paccāsatti nāma ṭhānato āsannatā guṇato vā,
anya-e0807n:159_3: Niggahītassa anusarīyatīti pacchā katvā sarīyatīti anussarotipi vuccati.
anya-e0807n:160_0: Ānantarikaṃ ya+māhu, yaṃ yadeva, paccattaṃ eva, taṃ hiitī+dha –
anya-e0807n:162_6: “Abyabhicārinā byabhicārī niyamyate”ti ñāyā evasaddasahacariyā “ya” iti sabbādiyasaddasseva gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:168_0: Niggahītassa ma ya dā honti vā sare kvaci.
anya-e0807n:170_2: taṃ nipātanā”ti ñāyā lakkhaṇantarena avihitā desa+lopā+gama+vipallāsā,
anya-e0807n:170_16: sayanassa sānādese ca kate chavassa sayanaṃ=susānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:170_18: khassa khalaādese ca “saramhā dve”ti dvittādimhi ca kate uddhaṃ khaṃ assa udukkhalaṃ.
anya-e0807n:171_1: ravatissa rādese ca kate mahiyaṃ ravatīti mayūro.
anya-e0807n:184_11: Paccayā paṭhamaṃ karīyatīti pakati, saddo, dhātu ca.
anya-e0807n:185_0: Tattha saliṅgesu tāva akārantato pulliṅgā sugatasaddā satta vibhattiyo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0807n:186_0: 1. Dve dve+kānekesu nāmasmā siyo aṃyo nā hi sa naṃ smā hi sa naṃ smiṃ su
anya-e0807n:187_0: Etesaṃ dve dve honti ekānekatthesu vattamānato nāmasmā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:187_2: “atthavanta+madhātuka+mapaccayaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ kitaka+taddhita+samāsā ce”ti vuttattā taṃ nāmaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0807n:191_0: Saddattha+mabravuṃ keci, vibhatti pana jotakāti ca.
anya-e0807n:192_0: Tato ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṃ bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanañcāti aniyamena pasaṅge “nāmasmā”ti adhikāro.
anya-e0807n:195_0: Atoti vattate, atoti nāmavisesanattā “vidhibbisesanantassā”ti paribhāsato akārantato nāmasmā vidhi.
anya-e0807n:199_0: Akārantato nāmasmā paṭhamādutiyāyonaṃ ṭāṭe honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:202_0: Āmantaṇādhike atthamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hotīti ekasmiṃ ekavacanaṃ si.
anya-e0807n:207_0: Nāmasmā ga+sīnaṃ lopo hoti. Bho sugata ciraṃ tiṭṭha.
anya-e0807n:210_0: Aiuiccetesaṃ vā dīgho hoti ge pare tiliṅge+ti dīghe bho sugata sugatā ciraṃ tiṭṭha.
anya-e0807n:212_2: Ettha dutiyātatiyādibhāvo vibhattisutte siyo iti paṭhamāvibhatyādīni+mupādāya vuccati,
anya-e0807n:214_0: Tasmiṃ kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Nā+hiiti tatiyāvibhatti. Tatiyāekavacanaṃ nā.
anya-e0807n:217_0: Akārantato nāmasmā parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti niccaṃ. Sugatena kataṃ.
anya-e0807n:222_0: Nāmasmā paresaṃ smāhismiṃnaṃ mhābhimhi honti yathākkamaṃti hissa bhiādese sugatebhi.
anya-e0807n:224_3: Vibhattisutte ssa+naṃti dīghapāṭhena sugatassāti siddhepi “jhalā sassa no” tyādikāriyasuttesu ssassāti
anya-e0807n:226_0: Nāmasmā parassa sassa suñāgamo hoti. Sa ca “chaṭṭhiyā”ti vattamāne –
anya-e0807n:231_0: Kvaci pavattya+pavatti, kvaca+ññaṃ kvaci vā kvaci;
anya-e0807n:236_0: Akārantato parassa catutthiyā sassa āyo hoti vā bahulaṃ. Sugatāya.
anya-e0807n:236_1: Yebhuyyena tādattheyevā+ya+māyo dissatīti ito paraṃ no+dāharīyate.
anya-e0807n:241_0: Etasmā avadhikārakā pañcamīvibhatti hoti. Smā+hiiti pañcamī. Pañcamyekavacanaṃ smā,
anya-e0807n:244_0: Akārantato nāmasmā paresaṃ smā+smiṃnaṃ ṭā+ṭe honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:271_0: Vippayogato – “akisorā ānīyatū”ti tappaṭisedhā vaḷavā eva patīyate.
anya-e0807n:272_1: “rāma+lakkhaṇa”iti ubhinnaṃ sahacaraṇena rāmoti dāsarathi eva rāmo,
anya-e0807n:273_1: “rāma+jjunā” iti bhaggavo sahassabāhu ca aññamaññaviruddhāti te eva patīyante,
anya-e0807n:274_2: pavisāmi raṇaṅgaṇa”miti raṇaṅgaṇapaveso vāhanavisesena hotīti atthato turaṅgapatīti,
anya-e0807n:275_2: atra hi saddantarassā+bhāvepi bhojanopakaraṇasamavāya+mālokitabhāvato lavaṇe paṭipatti,
anya-e0807n:277_0: Sannidhānato – “ajjuno katavīriyoti” patīyate, no akatavīriyo ajjunoti.
anya-e0807n:278_1: “anudarā kaññā”ti udare asati kaññā eva natthīti tassā kisāṅgiyā majjhapadesoti patīyate.
anya-e0807n:279_2: atra hi rāmo payuttadāsarathismiṃ bhiyyo sādhāraṇo paricayoti dāsarathi eva patīyate,
anya-e0807n:280_0: Desato – “poṭṭhapā” iti kismiñci dese pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Kismiñci akkosavacanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:281_0: Kālato – “pace”ti dakkhiṇāpathe katthaci pubbaṇhe yāgupāke, sāyaṇhe tu odanapāke.
anya-e0807n:282_0: Byattito – “gāmassa addha” miti samabhāge, napuṃsakattā. “Gāmassa addho”ti pumattena tu asamabhāge.
anya-e0807n:283_1: “narapati sādhu rakkhati gomaṇḍala”miti mahīmaṇḍalapālanaṃ rājino+nurūpa+miti mahīmaṇḍalapālaneva patīti,
anya-e0807n:285_3: vattu kāyavikārā kathañci taṃ akatavāapi kenaci aññena “kiṃ tvaṃ taṃ akāsi “iti puṭṭho kopena bhamubhedā “ahaṃ katavā amhī”ti katheti,
anya-e0807n:286_3: atra hi samātari sapitarīti sambandhisaddābhāvepi sā mātā so pitā ca assa puttassāti patīyate.
anya-e0807n:287_1: “kākehi rakkhitabbaṃ dadhī”ti kākasaddo sabbesa+mupaghātakānaṃ sāmaññaṃ upalakkhetīti sunakhādisabbehipi nivārīyate.
anya-e0807n:288_0: Vacanato – “dārā”iti dārasaddo kalatte bahuvacananto, aññattha aniyatavacano.
anya-e0807n:289_1: “sajjitaṃ bhojana”miti vutte tapparikkhārattā tadupakaraṇa āsana, pāti,
anya-e0807n:290_0: Padhānabhāvato – “niggacchati avaninātho”ti rañño niggamanena tadupajīvīnampi niggamanaṃ viññāyati.
anya-e0807n:294_0: Eva+maññesampi akārantānaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ saddānaṃ rūpanayo kriyā+bhisambandho ca.
anya-e0807n:294_3: Ito paraṃ chaṭṭhiyā catutthīsamattā pañcamībahuvacanassa ca tatiyābahuvacanena samattā na tā dassiyante.
anya-e0807n:297_0: Akārantato nāmasmā parassa sissa e hoti vā kvaci.
anya-e0807n:297_6: Sisso+kārassa niccattā katthaci pakkhe ekāratta+mida+māraddhanti sisso+kārapakkhe eva bhavatīti “aṃ napuṃsake”ti
anya-e0807n:297_7: a+mādesena ekārassa napuṃsakavisaye bādhitattā “bahulaṃ” vidhānā napuṃsakepi sukhe dukkheti kvaci hoteva.
anya-e0807n:300_0: Akārantehi ekaccādīhi yonaṃ ṭe hoti. Ekacco, ekacce.
anya-e0807n:300_1: Bho ekacca ekaccā, ekacce. Ekaccaṃ, ekacce.
anya-e0807n:301_0: Kodho, kodhā. Bho kodha kodhā, kodhā. Kodhaṃ, kodhe.
anya-e0807n:304_3: “Ye uttamatthāni tayi labhimhā”ti atthasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgopi dissati.
anya-e0807n:307_0: Divādīhi nāmehi smino ṭi hoti niccaṃ. Divi,
anya-e0807n:310_0: Manādīhi smi+mādīnaṃ si+so+o+sā+sā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Mano, manā.
anya-e0807n:310_1: Bho mana manā, manā. Mano, manaṃ, mane.
anya-e0807n:315_1: Ahassa āpādittā rahoti nipātattā rahasīti vibhatyantapaṭirūpakanipātattā idha na gahitā.
anya-e0807n:318_1: “Sutānumitesu sutasambandhova balavā”ti ñāyā “ntassā”ti sutattā ntasseva aṃ,
anya-e0807n:320_0: Paṭhame yomhi nta+ntūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ntoiccādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0807n:322_0: Ge pare nta+ntūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ṭa+ṭā+aṃiccādesā niccaṃ honti bahulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:324_0: Aṃsesu ntapaccayassa ṭa hoti vā ntussa ca. Vavatthitavibhāsā+yaṃ. Gacchaṃ gacchantaṃ, gacchante.
anya-e0807n:326_0: Sa+smā+smiṃ+nāsu nta+ntūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ to+tā+ti+tā honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:328_0: Naṃmhi nta+ntūnaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:329_0: Evaṃ mahaṃ caraṃ tiṭṭhaṃ, dadaṃ bhuñjaṃ suṇaṃ pacaṃ;
anya-e0807n:330_0: Jayaṃ jīraṃ vacaṃ pīyaṃ, saraṃ kubbaṃ japaṃ vajaṃ.
anya-e0807n:334_0: Niyamasutta+midaṃ. Bhūdhātuto ntassa aṃ hoti simhi niccaṃ punabbidhānā. Bhavaṃ.
anya-e0807n:336_0: Bhavantasaddassa bhontādeso vā hoti ga+yo+nā+se. Ntoādeso,
anya-e0807n:336_2: Ge pana bho bhonta bhontā bhava bhavā bhavaṃ,
anya-e0807n:337_1: “kuto nu āgacchatha bho tayo janā”ti bahuvacanepi dassanato.
anya-e0807n:338_4: Saṃ santaṃ “saṃyogādilopoti nassa lope “yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati,
anya-e0807n:338_5: santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ”, sante.
anya-e0807n:342_0: Simhi mahantā+rahantānaṃ ntassa ṭā vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:345_0: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca parassa sissa ā hoti. Asmā,
anya-e0807n:347_0: Rājādīhi yuvādīhi ca yona+māno vā hoti. Asmāno asmā. Bho asma asmā, asmāno asmā.
anya-e0807n:349_0: Rājādīnaṃ yuvādīnañca ānaṅa hoti vā aṃmhi. Asmānaṃ asmaṃ, asmāno asme.
anya-e0807n:353_2: Kamma camma vesma bhasma brahma atta ātuma ghamma muddhaiti kammādayo.
anya-e0807n:353_4: Rāja brahma sakha atta ātuma gaṇḍivadhanva asma aṇima laghimādayo rājādayo.
anya-e0807n:354_0: “Dhammo vā+ññatthe”ti gaṇasuttena rājādīsu paṭṭhitattā daḷadhammo daḷadhammāti vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:354_1: Yuva sā suvā maghava puma vattahāti yuvādayo. Rājā,
anya-e0807n:356_0: “Sabbadattena rājinā”ti pāṭhampati ida+māraddhaṃ. Rājassi vā hoti nāmhi. Rājinā.
anya-e0807n:358_0: Nā+smāsu rājassa savibhattissa raññā hoti niccaṃ. Anekavaṇṇattā sabbassa. Raññā.
anya-e0807n:360_0: Rājassa ū hoti vā su+naṃ+hisu. “Chaṭṭhiyantassāti antassa hoti. Rājūhi rājehi rājūbhi rājebhi.
anya-e0807n:362_0: Se rājassa savibhattissa ete ādesā honti. Rañño raññassa rājino, rājūnaṃ.
anya-e0807n:364_0: Naṃmhi rājassa savibhattissa raññaṃ vā hoti. Raññaṃ. Raññā, rājūhi rājehi rājūbhi rājebhi.
anya-e0807n:366_0: Smimhi rājassa savibhattissa raññe+rājini honti niccaṃ. Raññe rājini, rājūsu rājesu.
anya-e0807n:368_0: Iti gaṇasuttena rājassa nā+smā+smiṃsu yaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0807n:369_0: Addhā, addhāno addhā. Bho addha addhā, addhāno addhā. Addhānaṃ addhaṃ, addhāno addhe.
anya-e0807n:371_0: Pumādīna+mu hoti vā sa+smāsu nāmhi ce+ti utte addhunā,
anya-e0807n:373_1: tassa ante vattamānā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā jhalasaññā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:373_3: iyu ca te vaṇṇā ceti iyuvaṇṇā,
anya-e0807n:373_4: “dvandante sūyamānaṃ pacceka+mabhisambandhiya te”ti vuttattā vaṇṇasaddaṃ pacceka+mabhisambandhiya “ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:375_0: Jhalato sassa no vā hoti. Addhuno addhussa addhassa, addhānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:377_1: addhunā addhumhā addhusmā addhā addhamhā addhasmā.
anya-e0807n:378_0: Attā, attāno iccādi yāva dutiyā rājāva, kammādittā ene attena attanā.
anya-e0807n:382_0: Atta+ātumehi sassa no vā hoti. Attano attassa, attānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:384_0: Brahmā atta+ātumehi ca parassa smāssa nā hoti niccaṃ. Attanā.
anya-e0807n:385_2: “brahmassu vā”ti sutte “brahmassū”ti yogavibhāgā ānomhi brahmassa u,
anya-e0807n:389_0: Brahmassu hoti nāmhi niccaṃ. Brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi.
anya-e0807n:391_7: imassa ākatigaṇattā brahmassa kammādittepi ettha vuttā.
anya-e0807n:394_0: Sakhato yona+māyo no honti vā āno ca. Sakhāyo sakhāno.
anya-e0807n:396_0: Sakhassa i hoti niccaṃ no+nā+sesu. Sakhino.
anya-e0807n:398_0: Sakhassa vā āraṅa hoti yo+svaṃ+hisu smā+naṃsuca.
anya-e0807n:402_0: Āravādesamhā yonaṃ ṭo ṭe vā honti yathākkamaṃti ṭe.
anya-e0807n:404_0: Sakhassa vā i hoti smā+naṃsu. Sakhīnaṃ sakhānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:406_0: Āravādesamhā nā+smānaṃ ṭā hoti niccaṃ. Sakhārā,
anya-e0807n:408_0: Sakhato smino ṭe hoti niccaṃ. Sakhe,
anya-e0807n:408_3: tasmā “nadādito ṅī”ti vīmhi ālapanattā vā rasso.
anya-e0807n:411_0: Yuvādīhi yonaṃ no+ne vā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:411_1: “Yona+māno”ti ānomhi siddhepi “dutiyassa ne”ti ganthagāravo hotīti yathākkamaṃpati lāghavatthaṃ noggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:417_0: Yuvā sassa vā ino hoti. Yuvino yuvassa, yuvānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:419_0: Yuvādahi smā+smiṃnaṃ nā+ne niccaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ. Yuvānā,
anya-e0807n:421_0: Pumasaddato gassa aṃ vā hoti. Pumaṃ puma pumā, pumāno pumā. Pumānaṃ pumaṃ, pumāno pumāne pume.
anya-e0807n:423_2: na lakkhaṇikassā”ti ñāyā paṭipadottanāvibhatti eva gayhati,
anya-e0807n:423_7: “Puma+kamma+thāma+ddhānaṃ vā sa+smāsu ce”ti vā utte pumunā pumena.
anya-e0807n:425_0: Smino ne vā hoti. Pumāne pume pumamhi pumasmiṃ.
anya-e0807n:427_0: Pumassa sumhi pumādīnaṃ yaṃ niccaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0807n:427_1: taṃ vā hotīti ānaṅa vā hoti ā ca.
anya-e0807n:429_0: Vattahā sanaṃnaṃ nonānaṃ niccaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ. Vattahāno vattahānānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:433_2: “Aghonaṃ”ti ghappaṭisedhe akate ssa+mādīsu paresu ghassa vikappena rasso,
anya-e0807n:433_3: ekavacanādīsu yosu ca paresu ghassa niccena rassoti viruddhatthagahaṇanivattanattho ghapaṭisedho.
anya-e0807n:433_5: Ekavacane yosu ca gha+okārantavajjitānaṃ nāmānaṃ rasso hoti tiliṅgeti rasse sampatte –
anya-e0807n:435_0: Anapuṃsakassa rasso na hotīti simhi tu na rasso. Sā.
anya-e0807n:435_2: thalepi vassatī”ti ñāyā yuvādittā sissa ā.
anya-e0807n:435_3: Yosu rasse “yonaṃ no+ne vā”ti yossa no.
anya-e0807n:437_0: Sāsaddassa ānaṅa hoti aṃ+se ge ca niccaṃ.
anya-e0807n:438_0: Suvā yuvāva. “Ekavacanayosva+ghonaṃ”ti rassattaṃ viseso. Ge tu –
anya-e0807n:440_0: Aghonaṃ ge vā rasso hoti tiliṅge. Bho suva suvā.
anya-e0807n:444_0: Jhasaññassa issa yosu vā ṭa hoti pulliṅge. Munayo,
anya-e0807n:444_5: Atoti sāmaññaniddesā lakkhaṇikaakārato yonaṃ ṭāṭe sampattāpi avidhānasāmatthiyā na honti.
anya-e0807n:448_0: Yonaṃ lopenisu ca dīgho hoti. Muni.
anya-e0807n:448_1: Munayoti ettha yolopo kimatthaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0807n:448_9: “Yolopanisu” “vīmantuvantūna” miccādiñāpakā ikārukārānaṃ sunaṃhisu dīghassā+niccattā munihi muninaṃ munisu itipi hoti.
anya-e0807n:448_15: “Ito kvaci sassa ṭānubandho” (gaṇasutta)ti brahmādīsu pāṭhā “yo ca sisso mahāmune”ti ettha “gha+brahmādite”ti sassa eṭa.
anya-e0807n:450_0: Joti pāṇi gaṇṭhi muṭṭhi, kucchi vatthi sāli vīhi;
anya-e0807n:451_0: Byādhi odhi bodhi sandhi, rāsi kesi sāti dīpi.
anya-e0807n:452_0: Isi gini maṇi dhani, giri ravi kavi kapi;
anya-e0807n:453_0: Asi masi nidhi vidhi, ahi kimi pati hari.
anya-e0807n:454_0: Ari timi kali bali, jaladhi ca gahapati;
anya-e0807n:459_0: Aggismā sissa ni hoti vā. Aggini aggi, aggayo iccādi munisaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:461_0: Isismā sissa ṭe vā hoti. Ise isi. “Gha+brahmādite”ti gassa e vā, bho ise isi, isayo isī. Isiṃ.
anya-e0807n:463_1: na tve+kavibhattiyuttānaṃ”ti ñāyā dutiyāyossāti nānuvattiya yossāti sāmaññena anuvuttiya ekaccādito paṭhamā yossāpi ṭevidhānatthaṃ.
anya-e0807n:463_2: Isismā parassa dutiyā yossa ṭe vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:466_0: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo vā hoti. Ādo ādimhi ādismiṃ, ādīsu.
anya-e0807n:469_0: Aññatthe vattamānato ikārantato nāmasmā yonaṃ no+ne vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:471_0: Aññatthe ikārantato nāmasmā smino ne vā hoti kvaci.
anya-e0807n:475_0: Jhasaññito yonaṃ no+ne vā honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Daṇḍino.
anya-e0807n:477_0: Jantu+hetūhi īkārantehi gha+pasaññehi ca paresaṃ yonaṃ vā lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n:479_0: Jhasaññīto aṃvacanassa naṃ vā hoti. Daṇḍinaṃ daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍine.
anya-e0807n:481_0: Jhīto yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:481_3: “Jhalā sassa no”ti nomhi kate daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṃ.
anya-e0807n:483_2: bahulādhikārā smimhi gāmaṇī+senānī+sudhīpabhutīnaṃ niādesābhāvo ca viseso. Evaṃ –
anya-e0807n:484_0: Dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī hatthī, cakkī pakkhī dāṭhī raṭṭhī;
anya-e0807n:485_0: Chattī mālī cammī yogī, bhāgī bhogī kāmī sāmī.
anya-e0807n:486_0: Dhajī gaṇī sasī kuṭṭhī, jaṭī yānī sukhī sikhī;
anya-e0807n:487_0: Dantī mantī karī cāgī, kusalī musalī balī; (Vācī, rū)
anya-e0807n:493_0: Lato yonaṃ vo hoti vā pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:495_1: Ettha “pumālapane vevo” tya+tra vossa sahacaritañāyā anissitattā jātivasena “lā yonaṃ” tyādo vo ca gayhati.
anya-e0807n:497_0: Lasaññato uto yossā+lapane ve+vo honti vā pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:497_5: “Jhalā sassa no”ti lato sassa no vā,
anya-e0807n:501_0: Jantvādito yonaṃ no hoti vo ca pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:502_2: “Yomhi vā kvacī”ti lasaññassa ussa vā ṭādeso, hetayo.
anya-e0807n:502_3: Yomhi antaraṅgattā paṭhamaṃ ṭādese kate pacchā yolopābhāvo,
anya-e0807n:505_0: Naṃmhi bahuno katissa ca nuka hoti tiliṅge. Bahunnaṃ. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:508_1: “Kattari ltu+ṇakā”ti vihitaltupaccayassa gahaṇā yato dhātuto hi so vihito,
anya-e0807n:508_3: tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇaṃ”ti ñāyā tadavinābhāvato tadantadhātunopi gahaṇaṃti ltupaccayantānaṃti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:510_0: Ltupaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañcā+raṅa hoti sato+ññatra. “Āraṅasmā”ti ṭo, vattāro.
anya-e0807n:514_0: Su+hisu ltu+pitādīna+māraṅa vā hoti. Vattārehi vattārebhi vattūhi vattūbhi.
anya-e0807n:516_0: Ltu+pitādīhi sassa lopo vā hoti. Vattu vattuno vattussa.
anya-e0807n:520_0: Naṃmhi ltu+pitādīna+mā vā hoti. Vattānaṃ vattūnaṃ. Smāssa ṭā, vattārā.
anya-e0807n:524_0: Smimhi āro rasso hoti. Vattari, vattāresu vattūsu vattusu. Evaṃ –
anya-e0807n:525_0: Evaṃ bhattu kattu netu, sotu ñātu jetu chettu;
anya-e0807n:526_0: Bhettu dātu dhātu boddhu, viññāpetādayopi ca.
anya-e0807n:527_0: Satthusaddassa pana nāmhi bahulādhikārā “ltu+pitādīna+mase”ti vā āravādese satthārā satthunā.
anya-e0807n:530_0: Natvādivajjitānaṃ pitādīna+māro rasso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0807n:530_1: “Ltu+pitādīna+mase” “su+hisvā+raṅa” “naṃmhi vā”ti ettha vuttavibhattīsu paresu āraṅa hotīti tā vibhattiyo paṭicca sabbāsūti vuttaṃ. Pitaro.
anya-e0807n:533_1: Yomhi “ntantūnaṃ nto yomhi paṭhame”ti savibhattissa ntussa nto hoti.
anya-e0807n:533_2: Ettha ca “ntu vantu+mantā+vantu+tavantusambandhī”ti paribhāsato ntu ca vantvādisambandhīyeva gayhate,
anya-e0807n:535_6: “Ntassa ca ṭa vaṃ+se”ti aṃsesu ntassa ṭo vā,
anya-e0807n:535_13: na lakkhaṇikassā”ti ñāyā “na lakkhaṇikassā”ti vuttabyattipakkha+manapekkhitvā “ato”ti rassākārajātiyā
anya-e0807n:535_23: “Ntassa ca ṭa vā”ti yogavibhāgā yosu ca ntussa vā ṭādese kate yossa ṭā,
anya-e0807n:536_0: Evaṃ gaṇavā kulavā phalavā yasavā dhanavā sutavā bhagavā himavā balavā sīlavā paññavā iccādī.
anya-e0807n:538_0: Himavato simhi ntussa o vā hoti, himavanto himavā. Sesaṃ purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:539_0: Āyasmantusaddo kammavācāya kvaci bahulādhikārā dvivacanena āyasmantā,
anya-e0807n:540_0: Evaṃ satimā dhitimā gatimā mutimā matimā jutimā sirimā hirimā thutimā ratimā yatimā sucimā kalimā balimā
anya-e0807n:540_1: kasimā rucimā buddhimā cakkhumā bandhumā hetumā setumā ketumā rāhumā bhāṇumā khāṇumā vijjumā iccādayo.
anya-e0807n:542_6: “Ge vā”ti vā rasse bho vessabhu vessabhū,
anya-e0807n:542_12: Gotrabhū+sahabhūsaddehi pana yonaṃ “jantvādito no vā”ti no, vo vā,
anya-e0807n:544_0: Kūpaccayantato yonaṃ no vā hoti pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:544_2: Aññatra “lā yonaṃ vo pume”ti na vo,
anya-e0807n:545_0: Evaṃ maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū kataññū kathaññū viññū vidū iccādayo.
anya-e0807n:545_1: Ettha “vidā kū” “vito ñāto” “kammā”ti tīsu suttesu kūpaccayassa gahitattā vedagūādayo rūpaccayantā na gahitā.
anya-e0807n:549_0: Ga+si+hi+naṃvajjitāsu vibhattīsu gosaddassa gāva+gavā honti niccaṃ.
anya-e0807n:551_0: Ubha+gohi yonaṃ ṭo hoti. Gāvo gavo. Bho go, gāvo gavo.
anya-e0807n:553_0: Aṃvacane gossa gāvu vā hoti. Gāvuṃ gāvaṃ gavaṃ, gāvo gavo.
anya-e0807n:555_2: “Pañcamiyaṃ parasse”ti vattante “ādissā”ti nāssa ā hoti, paralopo,
anya-e0807n:557_0: Gossa se vā gavaṃ hoti saha sena.
anya-e0807n:557_2: Kaccāyane “gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ”ti pāḷiṃ paṭicca naṃmhi bahuvacanameva sādhitaṃ,
anya-e0807n:559_0: Naṃvacanena saha gossa gunnaṃ hoti gavañca vā.
anya-e0807n:559_2: Gāvā gāvamhā gāvasmā gavā gavamhā gavasmā.
anya-e0807n:559_3: Gāve gāvamhi gāvasmiṃ gave gavamhi gavasmiṃ.
anya-e0807n:563_0: Dasasva+tthesu go vutto, lagge ca vajire iti.
anya-e0807n:568_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassa+nte vattamāno ākāro ghasañño hoti.
anya-e0807n:570_0: Ghapato smiṃvibhattipariyantānaṃ ekatte nādīnaṃ ya+yā honti yathākkamaṃ. Kaññāya,
anya-e0807n:572_2: “Gha+ pate+kasmiṃ nādīnaṃ ya+yā” “yaṃ”ti ca imesaṃ apavādādīnaṃ visaye mhissa ussaggattā pavatti natthīti
anya-e0807n:572_3: smino bahulādhikārā “smā+hi+sminna” miccādinā mhikate “dasasahassimhi dhātumhī”ti sijjhati. Kaññāsu. Evaṃ –
anya-e0807n:573_0: Saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā taṇhā vīṇā;
anya-e0807n:574_0: Icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā.
anya-e0807n:575_0: Jaṅghā gīvā jīvhā vācā, chāyā āsā gaṅgā nāvā;
anya-e0807n:576_0: Gāthā senā lekhā sālā, mālā velā pūjā khiḍḍā.
anya-e0807n:577_0: Pipāsā vedanā saññā, cetanā tasinā pajā;
anya-e0807n:578_0: Devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā.
anya-e0807n:579_0: Ūkā sephālikā laṅkā, salākā vālukā sikhā;
anya-e0807n:580_0: Visākhā visikhā sākhā, vācā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā.
anya-e0807n:581_0: Jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, karuṇā vanitā latā;
anya-e0807n:582_0: Kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā siṃsapā papā.
anya-e0807n:583_0: Pabhā sīmā khamā chāyā, khattiyā sakkharā surā;
anya-e0807n:584_0: Dolā tulā silā lilā, lāle+lā mekhalā kalā.
anya-e0807n:586_0: Nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo.
anya-e0807n:589_4: Sabhāparisāhi smino “tiṃ sabhāparisāyā”ti tiṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:593_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānassa nāmassa+nte vattamānā ivaṇṇu+vaṇṇā pasaññā honti.
anya-e0807n:595_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa lopo hoti vā yakāre.
anya-e0807n:595_12: matyaṃ matiyaṃ matyā matiyā, matīsu. Evaṃ –
anya-e0807n:596_0: Patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti;
anya-e0807n:597_0: Santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi.
anya-e0807n:598_0: Bhūmi jāti pīti suti, nandi sandhi soṇi koṭi;
anya-e0807n:599_0: Diṭṭhi vuṭṭhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi.
anya-e0807n:600_0: Sati muti gati cuti, dhiti yuvati vikati;
anya-e0807n:601_0: Rati ruci rasmi asani, vasani osadhi aṅguli;
anya-e0807n:602_0: Dhūli dudrabhi doṇi, aṭavi chavi iccādi.
anya-e0807n:604_0: Ratyādīhi smino ṭo vā hoti. Ratto ratyaṃ rattiyaṃ ratyā rattiyā, rattīsu. Sesaṃ matisamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:608_7: Dāsyaṃ dāsiyaṃ dāsyā dāsiyā, dāsīsu. Evaṃ –
anya-e0807n:609_0: Mahī vetaraṇī vāpī, pāṭalī kadalī ghaṭī;
anya-e0807n:610_0: Nārī kumārī taruṇī, vāruṇī brāhmaṇī sakhī.
anya-e0807n:611_0: Gandhabbī kinnarī nāgī, devī yakkhī ajī migī;
anya-e0807n:612_0: Vānarī sūkarī sīhī, haṃsī kākī ca kukkuṭī.
anya-e0807n:616_2: Sa ca “mānubandho sarāna+mantā paro”ti mānubandhattā sarāna+mantā paro hotīti īkārā paro.
anya-e0807n:616_4: yassa ca pubbarūpaṃ, najjāyo. Vā pa-
anya-e0807n:619_0: Ettha dhātusaddo “manodhātunā”ti abhidhammāvatāre vuttattā pulliṅgepi dissati,
anya-e0807n:623_0: Evaṃ vadhū ca sarabhū, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0807n:630_0: Akārantato nāmasmā sissa aṃ hoti napuṃsake. Napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0807n:632_1: Nīnaṃ niccavidhānepi “ninaṃ vā”ti pakkhe ṭāṭe honti,
anya-e0807n:647_0: Ekaccādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti, ekaccāni.
anya-e0807n:648_0: Evaṃ paṭhamaṃ, paṭhamāni iccādi. Padaṃ, padā padāni iccādi napuṃsakasamaṃ. Nāsmiṃsu bhedo.
anya-e0807n:650_0: Padādīhi nāssa sā hoti vā. Padasā padena.
anya-e0807n:652_0: Padādīhi smino si hoti vā. Padasi pade padamhi padasmiṃ, padesu. Evaṃ bilasaddo.
anya-e0807n:653_3: ussa lasaññāyaṃ sa+smānaṃ yathāyogaṃ no+nā niccaṃ,
anya-e0807n:653_7: “Kammādito”ti smino vā nimhi kammani kamme kammamhi kammasmiṃ,
anya-e0807n:658_0: Jhalato yonaṃ ni hoti vā napuṃsake. Aṭṭhīni.
anya-e0807n:676_0: Sabba katara katama ubhaya itara añña aññatara aññatama,
anya-e0807n:676_3: Ya tya ta eta ima amu kiṃ eka tumha amha iccete sabbādayo.
anya-e0807n:677_0: Khiḍḍā paṇihitā tyāsu, rati tyāsu patiṭṭhitā;
anya-e0807n:678_0: Bījāni tyāsu ruhanti, yadidaṃ sattā pajāyareti –
anya-e0807n:683_0: Akārantehi sabbādīhi yonaṃ eṭa hoti niccaṃ. Sabbe.
anya-e0807n:683_1: Bho sabba sabbā, sabbe. Sabbaṃ, sabbe. Sabbena,
anya-e0807n:685_0: Akārantānaṃ sabbādīnaṃ e hoti naṃmhi su+hisu ca. Ettha ādisaddo avayave, vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:692_0: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato sassa ssā vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:692_1: Amussāti rūpassa “ssā vā te+ti+mā+mūhī”ti ssādesena siddhattā vāggahaṇa+muttaratthaṃ.
anya-e0807n:694_0: Sabbādīnaṃ ghapato smino ssaṃ vā hoti. Sabbassaṃ sabbāyaṃ sabbāya, sabbāsu.
anya-e0807n:695_0: Napuṃsake sabbaṃ. “Yonaṃ nī”ti napuṃsake yossa nimhi –
anya-e0807n:697_0: Sabbādīhi parassa nissa ṭā na hoti.
anya-e0807n:699_0: Ssamādīsu itara+eka+añña+eta+ima iccetesaṃ i hoti niccaṃ.
anya-e0807n:702_0: Etehi chahi savisaye eṭa vā hotīti yossa eṭa,
anya-e0807n:704_0: Taṃnāmabhūtehi appadhānehi ca sabbādīhi sabbādikāriyaṃ na hoti. Te sabbā,
anya-e0807n:704_4: Nāmabhūte ca aññapadatthādo appadhānavisaye ca sabbādikāriyanisedhena “paramasabbe tiṭṭhanti” tyādito padhānapadantato eṭaādayo honti,
anya-e0807n:706_0: Tatiyatthena yoge ca sabbādikāriyaṃ na hoti. Māsena pubbā māsapubbā iccādi.
anya-e0807n:711_0: Yo, ye. Yā, yāyo. Yaṃ, yāni iccādi sabbasamaṃ. Yādīna+mālapane rūpaṃ na sambhavati.
anya-e0807n:714_0: Tya+te+tāna+manapuṃsakānaṃ tassa so hoti simhi. Syo, tye. Syā, tyā, tyāyo. Tyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:717_0: Tasaddassa tassa no vā hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0807n:717_1: “Tya+te+tānaṃ tassā”ti ca ettha tyādīnaṃ takāraggahaṇaṃ syā sā esā nāyoti itthiyaṃ sabbasamā hotīti. Ne te. Naṃ taṃ, ne te.
anya-e0807n:719_0: “Ṭa sa+smā+smiṃ+naṃsmi+massa cā”ti vuttepi tesaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ādesesu ssāyādīsu paresu “tadādesā tadiva
anya-e0807n:719_1: bhavantī”ti ñāyā ṭādese siddhepi yādiādesantare pare nivattanatthaṃ ssādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:720_0: Sādīsvi+massa tasaddatakārassa ca ṭo vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:720_5: Amhā asmā namhā nasmā tamhā tasmā.
anya-e0807n:720_6: Amhi asmiṃ namhi nasmiṃ tamhi tasmiṃ,
anya-e0807n:721_0: Itthiyaṃ sā, nā nāyo tā tāyo. Naṃ taṃ, nā nāyo tā tāyo. Nāmhi –
anya-e0807n:723_0: Ghapasaññehi ta+eta+ima+amūhi ekatte nādīnaṃ ssā vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:723_1: Antassarānaṃ ghapavohārena taṃsahacaritāpi saddā “kunte pavesayā”ti ñāyā gayhantīti “ghapasaññehi ta+eta+ima+amūhī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:725_0: Ssaṃssāssā yesu tassa vā i hoti.
anya-e0807n:725_3: Sassa vā ssāmhi assā nassā tissā tassā.
anya-e0807n:727_3: Naṃvacanassa sa+mādese takārassa ca vā ṭādese āsaṃ nāsaṃ nāsānaṃ tāsaṃ tāsānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:727_4: Sattamiyaṃ assaṃ assā nassaṃ nassā nāyaṃ nāya tissaṃ tissā tassaṃ tassā tāyaṃ tāya,
anya-e0807n:728_0: Napuṃsake naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni. Naṃ taṃ, ne nāni te tāni. Sesaṃ pumeva.
anya-e0807n:729_0: “Yaṃtaṃsaddā niccasambandhā”ti ñāyā yaṃsaddena aniyamitatthaṃ taṃsaddo niyameti.
anya-e0807n:732_0: Vuttattā ettheva taṃsaddo yaṃsaddaṃ nāpekkhati. Yathākkamaṃ tatri+da+mudāharaṇaṃ –
anya-e0807n:734_0: Eso, ete. Esā, etā etāyo, etaṃ, etāni iccādi ṭa+nādesābhāvova viseso.
anya-e0807n:737_0: Imasaddassa anapuṃsakassa ayaṃ hoti simhi. Ayaṃ, ime. Imaṃ, ime.
anya-e0807n:739_0: Imasaddassa anitthiyaṃ nāmhi ana+imiiccādesā honti. “Ate+nā”ti ene anena iminā. Himhi –
anya-e0807n:741_1: “Nāmaggahaṇe liṅgavisiṭṭhassāpi gahaṇaṃ”ti ñāyā ‘anitthiyaṃ’ti itthiliṅganisedhā imassāti nāmaggahaṇavisaye liṅgavisesitassa imasaddassāpi gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:741_2: Tassa phalaṃ “tatassa no sabbāsu” tyādo liṅgattaye kāriyasiddhi.
anya-e0807n:741_4: “Ṭa sasmāsmi”miccādinā sabbassi+massa vā ṭādese assa imassa,
anya-e0807n:741_5: vā ṭe esaṃ esānaṃ imesaṃ imesānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:742_4: vā ṭādese “ssa” miccādinā iādese ca kate assā imissā imāya,
anya-e0807n:742_7: Naṃvacanassa sa+mādese imassa ca vā ṭādese assa “sunaṃhi sū”ti dīghe ca kate āsaṃ,
anya-e0807n:742_9: Sattamiyaṃ assaṃ imissaṃ assā imissā imāyaṃ imāya, imāsu.
anya-e0807n:745_0: Aṃsisu saha tehi imassi+daṃ hoti vā napuṃsake.
anya-e0807n:750_0: Anapuṃsakassā+mussa makārassa so hoti simhi. Asu, yo –
anya-e0807n:752_1: amusaddato yonaṃ lopo hoti niccaṃ pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:757_0: Amusmā sassa no na hoti. Amussa,
anya-e0807n:758_8: Sattamiyaṃ amussaṃ amussā amuyaṃ amuyā, amūsu.
anya-e0807n:761_0: Aṃsisu saha tehi amussa aduṃ hoti vā napuṃsake. Aduṃ, silopo, amuṃ.
anya-e0807n:764_0: Amu eva amukoti sakatthe kapaccaye taddhitavuttittā “ekatthatāyaṃ”ti silope ca kate “nimittābhāve nemittikassābhāvo”ti
anya-e0807n:764_1: ñāyā nimittabhūtassa sissā+bhāve nemittikassa “massā+mussā”ti kattabbassa sakārassa nivuttīti ‘ke vā’ti
anya-e0807n:764_3: Amussa massa ke sa hoti vā.
anya-e0807n:767_0: Sabbāsu vibhattīsu kissa ko hoti. Sisso, ko, ke. Kaṃ, ke. Kena, kehi kebhi.
anya-e0807n:769_0: Anitthiyaṃ kissa ki vā hoti sasmiṃsu.
anya-e0807n:770_0: Itthiyaṃ vibhattīsu paresu kādese kate akārantattā majjhe āpaccayakaraṇa+maviruddhanti ā, kā, kāyo. Kaṃ,
anya-e0807n:773_0: Aṃsisu saha tehi kiṃ saddassa kiṃhoti napuṃsake.
anya-e0807n:773_1: Kādesassa sāmaññattā “visesavihitā vidhayo sāmaññavidhayo nisedhentī”ti ñāyā kiṃādesena kādesanivutti. Kiṃ, kāni. Kiṃ, ke kāni.
anya-e0807n:774_4: Aññatra tulyādīsu bahuvacanantopi. Eko, eke. Ekā,
anya-e0807n:777_0: Idha attaparagāravavasena ekassāpi “amhākaṃ rañño”tipi “eke ācariyā”tipi bahuvacanassa lokena icchitattā bahulavidhānā bahuvacaneneva sijjhati.
anya-e0807n:778_0: Tumha+amhasaddā aliṅgā, tathā ubha+kati+dvisaddā, pañcādayo aṭṭhārasantā ca. Tumha si, amha si.
anya-e0807n:780_0: Amhi simhi ca tumhassa savibhattissa tuvaṃ+tvaṃ honti. Tuvaṃ tvaṃ.
anya-e0807n:782_0: Simhi amhassa savibhattissa ahaṃ hoti. Ahaṃ, yevasve+ṭa, tu mhe.
anya-e0807n:784_0: Yosva+mhassa savibhattissa maya+masmā vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Mayaṃ amhe.
anya-e0807n:786_0: Aṃmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ+maṃ+tavaṃ+mamaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ. Taṃ, maṃ, tavaṃ, mamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:788_0: Tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ paccekaṃ ṅaṃ+ṅākaṃ vā honti yomhi dutiye,
anya-e0807n:790_0: Nāsmāsu tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayā+mayā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:790_1: “Nāsmāsū”ti bahuvacanesupi vibhattikkama+manapekkhitvā saddakkamena paccekaṃ dve dve honti.
anya-e0807n:792_0: Tumhassa tayātayīnaṃ takārassa tva hoti vā. Tvayā tayā, mayā. Tumhehi tumhebhi, amhehi amhebhi.
anya-e0807n:794_0: Se tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ. Tava tuyhaṃ, mama mayhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:796_0: Naṃsesva+mhassa savibhattissa asmākaṃ+mamaṃ honti yathākkamaṃ. Mamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:798_0: Naṃmhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savitattīnaṃ ṅaṃ+ṅākaṃ honti paccekaṃ.
anya-e0807n:798_3: ettha pana attagāravavasena aṃmhi tumhaṃ amhaṃbhi sijjhanti bahulādhikārā.
anya-e0807n:800_0: Smāmhi tumhassa savitattissa tvamhā hoti vā. Tvamhā tvayā tayā, mayā.
anya-e0807n:802_0: Smimhi tumhaamhasaddānaṃsavibhattīnaṃ tayi+mayi hoti yathākkamaṃ. Tvayi tayi, mayi. Tumhesu.
anya-e0807n:804_2: Sabbādayo vutta+mapekkhantā vakkhamānaṃ vāti ida+mesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:806_2: tasmā “tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ”ti ettha vo na hoti.
anya-e0807n:811_0: Vuttattā ekeko vaṇṇo saddo nāma, tabbaṇṇasamūho padaṃ, tappadasamūho vākyañca. Tathā hi –
anya-e0807n:812_0: Vitatyantaṃ padaṃ tassa, ca yo vākyanti manvayaṃ;
anya-e0807n:819_0: Vuttaṃ. Tasmā “vibhatyantaṃ padaṃ, padasamūho vākya”nti ca vuccati.
anya-e0807n:821_0: Apañcamiyāyonaṃhisva+pādādo vattamānānaṃ padasmā paresa+mekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ vo+no honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:823_0: Nāmhi se ca apādādo vattamānānaṃ dasmā paresa+mekavākye ṭhitānaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ te+me vā honti yathākkamaṃ. Kataṃ te,
anya-e0807n:827_0: Kathitānukathitavisaye tumhaamhasaddānaṃ ādesā niccaṃ honti punabbidhānā.
anya-e0807n:827_3: Anvādese atho athoti vāradvayābhāvā niccanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:829_0: Vijjamānapubbasmā paṭhamantā paresaṃ tumhāmhānaṃ ādesā vā honti anvādese.
anya-e0807n:829_1: Gāme paṭo tumhākaṃ atho nagare kambalo vo atho nagare kambalo tumhākaṃ,
anya-e0807n:831_0: Dassanatthe ālovacanavajjite payujjamāne tumhaamhāna+mādesā na honti.
anya-e0807n:835_0: Samānādhikaraṇe parato sāmaññavacana+māmantaṇaṃ ekatthe asantaṃ viya na hoti māṇavaka jaṭilaka te pariggaho.
anya-e0807n:837_0: Bahūsu vattamāna+māmantaṇaṃ sāmaññavacana+mekatthe asantaṃ viya vā na hoti.
anya-e0807n:837_1: “Siddhe satyārambho nīyamāya vā vikappāyavā”ti vuttattā vikappattha+midaṃ.
anya-e0807n:842_0: Ubhā naṃvacanassa innaṃ hoti. Ubhinnaṃ, ubhosu.
anya-e0807n:844_0: Katimhā yonaṃ ṭi hoti. Kati, kati.
anya-e0807n:852_1: tasmiṃ sati vattu yāvantehi saddehi so+ttho viññāyate,
anya-e0807n:854_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho.
anya-e0807n:858_0: Yomhi dvissa savibhattissa duve+dve honti paccekaṃ. Duve dve, duve dve, dvīhi dvībhi.
anya-e0807n:860_0: Naṃmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā. Duvinnaṃ, aññatra –
anya-e0807n:862_0: Dvādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ nuka hoti naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0807n:862_4: “āgamā tagguṇībhūtā taggahaṇena gayhante”ti ñāyā nāgamopi taṃgahaṇena gayhatīti “sunaṃhisū”ti dīghappasaṅge
anya-e0807n:862_5: pakatiyā antāvayavabhūte sarantatā natthīti na dīgho. Dvinnaṃ, dvīsu.
anya-e0807n:864_0: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ti+catunnaṃ tayo+cattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Tayo, tayo, tīhi tībhi.
anya-e0807n:866_0: Jhasaññito tito naṃvacanassa ṇṇaṃ+ṇṇannaṃ honti. Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0807n:869_0: Vibhattisahitānaṃ ticatunnaṃ yomhi tisso+catasso honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ. Tisso, tisso,
anya-e0807n:873_0: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tīṇi+cattāri honti napuṃsake. Tīṇi, tīṇi,
anya-e0807n:876_0: Catussa savibhattissa yomhi caturo hoti vā pulliṅge.
anya-e0807n:877_0: Itthiyaṃ catasso. Catasso. Catūhi catūbhi. Catassannaṃ. Catassannaṃ. Catūsu.
anya-e0807n:878_0: Napuṃsake cattāri. Cattāri. Catūhi catūbhi. Iccādi pumeva.
anya-e0807n:880_2: Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṅkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭa hoti. Pañca. Pañca.
anya-e0807n:883_0: “Catthe”ti eko ca dasa cāti cattasamāse “amādī”ti ekena adhikā dasāti tatiyāsamāse vā kate “ekatthatāya”nti vibhattilopo.
anya-e0807n:887_0: Saṃkhyāto parassa dasassa ra hoti vibhāsā.
anya-e0807n:887_1: Sa ca “pañcamiyaṃ parassā”ti vattamāne “ādissā”ti dakārasseva hoti.
anya-e0807n:890_0: Āviṭṭhaliṅgattā saṃkhyāyaṃ uttarapade saliṅgeneva visesanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:893_0: Ettha yathākkamaṃ rukkho latā paṇṇaṃti suddhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:895_0: Dvissa bā vā hoti cattālīsā do nāññatthe. Rāde se bārasa.
anya-e0807n:899_0: Chatīhi parassa dasassa ḷo hoti ro ca. Teḷasa terasa.
anya-e0807n:901_0: Catussa cu+co honti vā dase pare. Dvitte cuddasa coddasa catuddasa.
anya-e0807n:903_0: Vīsati sesu paresu pañcassa paṇṇa+pannā honti yathākkamaṃ. Pannarasa pañcadasa.
anya-e0807n:906_0: Ūnā ca sā vīsati cāti “visesana+mekatthene”ti visesanasamāse “itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumi+tthī pume+vekatthe”ti
anya-e0807n:906_1: pumatte ca kate ekena ūnā vīsatīti tatiyāsamāse ekūnavīsati.
anya-e0807n:909_0: Ekena ūnā tiṃsati tiṃsā vāti ekūnatiṃsati ekūnatiṃsā vā.
anya-e0807n:909_7: Tiṃsāsaddassa pana silope “dīghasso”ti yogavibhāgā rasso, tiṃsa.
anya-e0807n:910_3: Evaṃ tettiṃsati tettiṃsādayo yāva ekūnacattālīsati ekūnacattālīsā.
anya-e0807n:912_0: Asatādo nāññatthe cattālīsādo dvissa e vā hoti ā ca.
anya-e0807n:912_5: Cattālīsati ekacattālīsati dvecattālīsati dvācattālīsati iccādi ekūnavīsatisamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:914_0: Asatādo nāññatthe cattālīsādo tisse hoti vā.
anya-e0807n:915_0: Evaṃ catucattālīsā pañcacattālīsā catucattālīsati pañcacattālīsati iccādi yāva ekūnapaññāsā.
anya-e0807n:916_1: Evaṃ dvepaññāsā dvāpaññāsā dvipaññāsā dvepaṇṇāsā dvāpaṇṇāsā dvipaṇṇāsā.
anya-e0807n:921_1: bho sata satā, sataṃ, sataṃ. Satena,
anya-e0807n:922_1: Vaggabhede tu sabbāsampi saṃkhyānaṃ bahuvacanopi hoteva “dvevīsatiyo jinadantā” “tisso vīsatiyo dinaghaṭikā” iccādi.
anya-e0807n:927_0: Athā+saṃkhyā vuccate, abyayanti ca vuccate. Taṃ pādi cādi, upasagganipātāti ca duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:928_0: Pa parā apa saṃ anu ava o ni du vi adhi api ati su u abhi pati pari upa ā ime vīsati pādayo.
anya-e0807n:930_0: Dhātvatthaṃ bādhate koci, koci taṃ anuvattate;

anya-e0807n:1147_4: Kammañca attanā patiṭṭhitakriyāya tadatthabhūtaindhanādīni pavattentaṃ “odanaṃ pacatī”tyādo nimittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1147_5: ‘Kaṭṭhehi paccatī’tyādo kaṭṭhāni jalanakriyāya sādhetabbapākassa aṅgabhāvena nimittaṃ.

anya-e0807n:1197_2: Ettha samīpaggahaṇassa bhāvappadhānattā sāmīpyameva gamyateti sāmīpyeti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1199_0: Tiṭṭhaguādīni aññatthena siddhāpi asmiṃ asaṃkhyasamāse nipātiyanti.
anya-e0807n:1199_1: Tiṭṭhanti gāvo yasmiṃ kāleti tiṭṭhantasadda+gosaddehi paṭhamāyomhi kate “vā+nekaññatthe”ti samāso,
anya-e0807n:1199_2: iminā nipātanā lope napuṃsakatthe ca kate simhi gossa “gossu”ti ukāre “pubbasmā+mādito”ti vibhattilopo.
anya-e0807n:1199_3: Evaṃ vahantī gāvo yasmiṃ kāleti vahaggu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1201_0: Orādayo saddā chaṭṭhiyantena sahe+katthā vā honti.
anya-e0807n:1201_10: Iminā nipātanāva niggahītalope ca ekāre ca kate oreccādi hoti.
anya-e0807n:1208_0: A+mādyantānaṃ kārakānaṃ akārakānañca samāso katthacimeva vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:1209_1: Saraṇaṃ gatoti samāse kate “ekatthatāyaṃ”ti vibhattilopādi upari sabbattha pubbasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1213_35: Brāhmaṇassa sukkā dantāti sāpekkhatāya na hoti.
anya-e0807n:1213_40: “Rañño pāṭaliputtakassa dhanaṃ”ti dhanasambandhe chaṭṭhīti pāṭaliputtakena sambandhābhāvā na hoti.
anya-e0807n:1213_41: “Rañño go ca asso ca puriso cā”ti bhinnatthatāya vākyameva.
anya-e0807n:1216_0: Visesanaṃ syādyantaṃ visessena syādyantena samānādhikaraṇenasahe+katthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0807n:1221_0: Sutte visessenāti avuttepi visesanassa sambandhīsaddattā sāmatthiyato labbhamānaākaḍḍhitasaddaṃ pati “visessenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1227_0: Ettha ca uppaladabbaṃ rattuppalādito visesayatīti nīlasaddo visesanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1227_2: Api ca bhamara+ṅgārādisāmañña nīlatthato visesiyatīti nīlaṃ visessaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1227_4: uppalassevāti visesanato uppalaṃ visesanaṃti kāmacāreneti vuttaṃ. Api ca –
anya-e0807n:1229_0: Govācāti pavutte tu, vācattho tu visesanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1232_0: Vuttattā mahanto+ccādīsu samānaliṅgādayo daṭṭhabbā. Bhiyyoti kiṃ, devā pamāṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1234_1: mahanto ca so puriso cāti vākye iminā suttena samāso.
anya-e0807n:1235_7: Santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso.
anya-e0807n:1235_22: Pumā ca so kokilo cāti puṅkokilo,
anya-e0807n:1236_0: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti khattiyakaññā.
anya-e0807n:1238_0: Bhāsitapumā itthī pumeva hotīti pumbhāvā itthipaccayānaṃ nivatti hoti.
anya-e0807n:1238_3: Brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā,
anya-e0807n:1238_12: Puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo.
anya-e0807n:1239_1: Yathā sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero,
anya-e0807n:1239_7: Mahosadho ca so paṇḍito cāti mahosadhapaṇḍito,
anya-e0807n:1240_2: siniddho ca so uṇho cāti siniddhuṇho māso.
anya-e0807n:1240_3: Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo,
anya-e0807n:1240_11: vāsito ca so litto cāti littavāsito,
anya-e0807n:1241_1: yathā sīhoti vutte upacaritā+nupacaritasīhānaṃ sāmaññappatītiyaṃ munisaddo viseseti.
anya-e0807n:1243_2: muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho,
anya-e0807n:1243_8: saddhammo ca so raṃsī cāti saddhammaraṃsī,
anya-e0807n:1243_11: samaṇo ca so puṇḍariko cāti samaṇapuṇḍariko,
anya-e0807n:1252_4: dhanunā yoge patiṭṭhāpanato “pāttho eva dhanuddharo”ti visessena yutto aññayogavivacchedako,
anya-e0807n:1254_2: tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti vā vākye visesanasamāse kate iminā napuṃsakattaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1256_1: Ññakāro “ṭa nañassā”ti visesanattho ‘pāmanaputtādīsu nassa ṭo mā hotū’ti.
anya-e0807n:1261_1: Tattha yo “asūrikapassārājadārā”tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbadā abhāvaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0807n:1261_3: Yo pana “abrāhmaṇa+mānayā”tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthaṃ pariyudāsitvā paṭikkhipitvā taṃsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṃ paṭipādayati,
anya-e0807n:1271_0: Ettha ca ubhosu pariyudāse brāhmaṇā añño brāhmaṇadhamme appatiṭṭhito khattiyādi brāhmaṇasadisova abrāhmaṇoti vutte patīyate.
anya-e0807n:1271_1: Itarasmiṃ pana pakkhe kenaci saṃsayanimittena khattiyādo brāhmaṇoti vuttassa micchāñāṇanivutti karīyati “brāhmaṇo+yaṃ na bhavati abrāhmaṇo”ti,
anya-e0807n:1271_3: Tattha sadisattaṃ vinā micchāñāṇāsambhavā payogasāmatthiyā ca sadisapaṭipatti,
anya-e0807n:1275_0: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahe+katthā honti niccaṃ syādividhivisayato+ññattha.
anya-e0807n:1275_3: Syādividhivisayo nāma “lakkhaṇitthambhūtā” dinā patiādīnaṃ visaye katadutiyā,
anya-e0807n:1275_4: tañca anvaddhamāsanti asaṃkhyasamāsa+miva mā hotūti “asyādividhimhī”ti nisedho.
anya-e0807n:1277_0: Kussu+ttaratthe vattamānassa sarādo uttarapade kadādeso hoti.
anya-e0807n:1277_4: Sareti kiṃ, kuputtā, kudārā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0807n:1279_0: Appatthe vattamānassa kussa kā hotu+ttarapade. Appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ. Evaṃ kāpupphaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1281_4: padhānaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ bhusaṃ vaddhaṃ pavaddhaṃ sarīraṃ,
anya-e0807n:1281_14: duṭṭhu kataṃ dukkataṃ abhi siñcanaṃ abhisekoti sananto,
anya-e0807n:1287_0: Avakuṭṭhaṃ kokilāya vanaṃ avakokilaṃ, avamayūraṃ. Avakuṭṭhanti pariccattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1291_0: Nikkhanto kosambiyā nikkosambi. Asyādividhimhīti kiṃ, rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate.
anya-e0807n:1293_1: Amalīnaṃ malīnaṃ karitvāti viggayha “abhūtatabbhāve karā+sa+bhūyoge vikārācī”ti cīpaccayekate iminā samāso. Ettha ca-
anya-e0807n:1293_3: “Pyo vā tvāssa samāse”ti pya hoti, pa-
anya-e0807n:1295_1: Alaṃ karitvā sakkaritvā asakkaritvāti viggayha samāse kate pye ca “sā sādhikarā ca cariccā”ti cādeso pararūpañca.
anya-e0807n:1296_2: ettha yathā dvāraṃ vivarāti vutte pakaraṇato aggala+miti viññāyati,
anya-e0807n:1296_3: eva+midhāpi nipātapabhāve aññe cāti sāmaññaṃ ce+ti āgamānusārena labbhamānavibhatyantapaṭirūpanipātāva viññāyanti.
anya-e0807n:1298_0: Anekaṃ syādyantaṃ aññassa padassa atthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:1302_0: 1. Tattha dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1303_1: āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāmanti āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo.
anya-e0807n:1308_0: Tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho aññapadatthaggahaṇena gayhati,
anya-e0807n:1309_1: Ettha ca āgatasaddo ca samaṇasaddo ca attano atthe aṭṭhatvā dutiyāvibhatyatthabhūte saṅghārāmasaṅkhāte aññapadatthe vattanti,
anya-e0807n:1309_2: tato samāseneva kammatthassa abhihitattā puna dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0807n:1310_1: jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo samaṇo,
anya-e0807n:1310_8: chinno rukkho yena so chinnarukkho pharasu.
anya-e0807n:1311_0: (Ga) catutthiyatthe-dinno suṅko yassa so dinnasuṅko rājā, dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ assāti dinnabhojano.
anya-e0807n:1312_1: niggatā janā yasmā so niggatajano gāmo,
anya-e0807n:1312_2: niggato ayo=sukhaṃ yasmāti nirayo, nikkile- so.
anya-e0807n:1313_6: Tevijjoti ettha tivijjo evāti sakatthe ṇo vuddhi ca.
anya-e0807n:1313_17: Ko pabhavo assāti kiṃ pabhavo kāyo.
anya-e0807n:1313_21: kucchito gandho assāti duggandhaṃ kuṇapaṃ, dummukho,
anya-e0807n:1314_0: Chandajātādīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṃ yathicchitattā ubhayaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati,
anya-e0807n:1316_2: nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni ceti nānādumapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0807n:1317_1: sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ so sampannasasso janapado.
anya-e0807n:1317_3: Ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṃ sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī.
anya-e0807n:1317_10: bahavo kattāro asmiṃ assa vāti bahukattuko deso,
anya-e0807n:1318_3: samānena janena saddhiṃ vāso assāti samānavāso puriso.
anya-e0807n:1319_2: parakkamenā+dhigatā sampadā yehi te parakkamādhigatasampadā mahāpurisā.
anya-e0807n:1319_4: Onīto pattato pāṇi yena so onītapattapāṇi.
anya-e0807n:1319_6: Mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti mattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1320_8: na vijjate vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado,
anya-e0807n:1321_2: saha hetunā vattati so sahetuko sahetu vā,
anya-e0807n:1322_2: nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo yo so nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo.
anya-e0807n:1322_5: Cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṃ paramatthadassanatoti cakkhubhūto bhagavā.
anya-e0807n:1323_1: suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā,
anya-e0807n:1323_3: Nāgassa gati viya gati assāti nāgagati.
anya-e0807n:1324_3: dvattayo ca te pattā ceti dvattipattā,
anya-e0807n:1324_6: cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā,
anya-e0807n:1325_2: pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarālaṃ sā pubbadakkhiṇā vidisā. Ettha –
anya-e0807n:1327_4: Pubbā ca sā dakkhiṇā ceti vā.
anya-e0807n:1328_2: “tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ”ti suttena samāse kate kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ kesākesī,
anya-e0807n:1328_3: daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍīti hoti.
anya-e0807n:1329_1: so assa atthīti sugandhīhi atthiatthe īpaccayena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1329_2: Yasmā ca bhaddāya kāpilāniyā apadāne “puno pattaṃ gahetvāna,
anya-e0807n:1329_4: tasmā vuttiyaṃ ikārantassa abhāvadīpanatthaṃ “sugandhi duggandhīti payogā na dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1331_1: Samuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāroti casaddassa attho catubbidho.
anya-e0807n:1333_0: Ubhayatthapadhāne catthe katha+mekatthībhāvo sambhave+ti ce, vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1336_0: Yasmā ekatthībhāvepi satīyasatīyatthe padhānaṃ, tasmā idaṃ vuccate –
anya-e0807n:1340_0: Samāso tu imaṃ aññe, jānante dvandanāmato.
anya-e0807n:1344_0: Samāhārotya+yaṃ cattho, so ca hoti napuṃsake.
anya-e0807n:1347_0: Vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnañca catthe ā hotīti ukārassa ā,
anya-e0807n:1349_0: Putte uttarapade pitādīna+mā hoti catthe. Pitā ca putto ca pitāputtā, evaṃ mātāputtā.
anya-e0807n:1354_0: Kvaci sarādiakārantaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā-atthadhammā, atthasaddā, saddatthā vā.
anya-e0807n:1357_0: Samāhāre sabbattha napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati, samāhārasse+kattā ekavacanameva.
anya-e0807n:1359_0: Napuṃsake vattamānassa syādīsu rasso. Bho chattupāhana, chattupāhanaṃ, chattupāhanena iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1360_0: Te ca samāhāritarītarayogā bahulaṃvidhānā niyatavisayāyeva honti,
anya-e0807n:1362_3: saṃkho ca paṇavo ca deṇḍimo ca,
anya-e0807n:1362_4: saṃkhā ca paṇavā ca deṇḍimā cāti vā saṃkhapaṇavadeṇḍimaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1363_0: Yoggaṅgānaṃ-phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1364_3: asi ca satti ca tomarañca piṇḍañca asisattitomarapiṇḍaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1365_2: ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1368_0: Khuddajantu anaṭṭhī vā, atha kho khuddakopi vā;
anya-e0807n:1369_0: Sataṃ vā pasato yesaṃ, keci ānatulā iti.
anya-e0807n:1373_3: cīvarañca piṇḍapāto ca senāsanañca gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ,
anya-e0807n:1373_4: tiṇañca kaṭṭho ca sākhā ca palāsañca tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1374_14: “dīghā+hovassekadesehi ca ratyā”ti apaccaye kate “manādyāpādīna+mo maye ce”ti okāro.
anya-e0807n:1376_0: Nadīnaṃ-gaṅgā ca yamunā ca gaṅgāyamunaṃ, evaṃ mahīsarabhū.
anya-e0807n:1377_2: usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ usīrabīraṇāni vā.
anya-e0807n:1378_1: assatthā ca kapiṭṭhā ca assatthakapiṭṭhaṃ assatthakapiṭṭhā vā,
anya-e0807n:1379_1: gajā ca gavajā ca gajagavajaṃ gajagavajā vā,
anya-e0807n:1379_2: ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṃ ajeḷakā,
anya-e0807n:1379_3: hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā ca hatthīgavassavaḷavaṃ hatthīgavassavaḷavā,
anya-e0807n:1380_1: haṃsā ca bakā ca haṃsabakaṃ haṃsabakā.
anya-e0807n:1382_1: sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṃ sāliyavā vā.
anya-e0807n:1383_1: sāko ca suvā ca sākasuvaṃ sākasuvā.
anya-e0807n:1384_1: kāsi ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṃ kāsikosalā,
anya-e0807n:1384_2: vajjī ca mallā ca vajjimallaṃ vajjimallā,
anya-e0807n:1384_3: aṅgā ca magadhā ca aṅgamagadhaṃ aṅgamagadhā,
anya-e0807n:1384_7: Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanāmarūpanti caturekapañcavokāravasena vattabbe bahulādhikārā sarūpekasesaṃ katvā nāmarūpanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1385_6: Catthe samāhāre “sabhāparisāyā”ti ñāpakā kvaci napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ na bhavati,
anya-e0807n:1391_0: Saṃkhyāhi parāya bhūmiyā a hoti. Dve bhūmiyo assa dvibhūmaṃ. Evaṃ tibhūmaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1393_0: Saṃkhyāhi parāsaṃ nadīgodhāvarīnaṃ samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0807n:1395_0: Asaṃkhyehi saṃkhyāhi ca parāya aṅguliyā samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0807n:1397_1: Dīghā ca sā ratti cāti dīgharattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1397_5: Pubbā ca sā ratti cāti pubbarattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1399_0: Gosaddā alopavisaye samāsanto a hoti na ce catthādīsu samāso.
anya-e0807n:1399_2: Paramo ca so go cāti paramagavo.
anya-e0807n:1403_0: Anugavaṃti nipaccate āyāmegamyamāne. Gavassa āyāmo anugavaṃ sakaṭaṃ, asaṅkhyasamāso.
anya-e0807n:1405_0: Akkhismā samāsanto a hoti aññatthe. Visālāni akkhīni yassa so visālakkho.
anya-e0807n:1407_0: Aṅgulantā aññatthe dārumhi samāsanto a hoti.
anya-e0807n:1407_1: Dve aṅguliyo avayavā asseti dvaṅgulaṃ dāru,
anya-e0807n:1413_4: Bhagavā mūlaṃ etesaṃti bhagavaṃmūlakā no dhammā.
anya-e0807n:1415_0: Iti ntantūnaṃ a hoti. Guṇavanto patiṭṭhā mamāti guṇavantapatiṭṭho+smi.
anya-e0807n:1417_0: Saṃkhyāsu parassa o, paro satasmā adhikā parosataṃ.
anya-e0807n:1419_0: Puthassa jane u hoti. Puthagevā+yaṃ janoti puthujjano, jassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1421_0: Ahe āyatane ca uttarapade chassa so hoti vā. Sāhaṃ chāhaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ chaḷāyatanaṃ. (Sambaraṃ)
anya-e0807n:1425_5: etthantare rūpāni ācariyasaṃgharakkhita mahāsāmittheramatena imināva “kvaci paccayeti suttena siddhāni,
anya-e0807n:1425_9: tadanthānañca ṇādivuttittā dvinnampi therānaṃ matā aviruddhā.
anya-e0807n:1431_0: Sotādīsu+ttarapadesu udakassa ussa lopo hoti. Dakasotaṃ, dakarakkhaso.
anya-e0807n:1433_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āpaccayo hoti. Dhammadinnā.
anya-e0807n:1435_0: Nadādīhi itthiyaṃ vīpaccayo hoti. Nadī mahī kumārī taruṇī vāruṇī gotamī.
anya-e0807n:1437_0: Gāvī go. Ākatigaṇo+yaṃ. Va-kāro “ntantūnaṃ vīmhi to vā”ti visesanattho.
anya-e0807n:1439_0: Yakkhādito itthiyaṃ inī hoti vī ca. Yakkhinī yakkhī, nāginī nāgī, sīhinī sīhī.
anya-e0807n:1448_1: Ghara+massā atthīti īmhi “yuvaṇṇehi nī”ti nī, gharaṇī.
anya-e0807n:1449_0: Ācariyā vā yalopo ca iti gaṇasuttena niyāmitattā imināva nīmhi yalopo ca, ācarinī ācariyā.
anya-e0807n:1451_0: Mātulādito bhariyāya+mānī hoti. Mātulānī, varuṇānī, gahapatānī, ācariyānī.
anya-e0807n:1452_0: Abhariyāyaṃ khattiyā vā iti gaṇasuttena niyamitattā iminā vā ānī,
anya-e0807n:1454_1: Karabho viya ūru yassā sā karabhorū,
anya-e0807n:1458_0: Vīmhi ntantūnaṃ to vā hoti. Gacchatī gacchantī, sīlavata sīlavantī.
anya-e0807n:1460_0: Vīmhi bhavato bhotādeso vā hoti. Bhotī bhavantī.
anya-e0807n:1462_0: Vīmhi puthussa pathavaputhavā honti. Pathavī puthavī, ṭhe pathavī.
anya-e0807n:1468_0: Chaṭṭhīyantā nāmasmā vā ṇapaccayo hoti apacce+bhidheyye.
anya-e0807n:1468_1: Apaccasaddasambandhittena apaccavantato katasarapaccayo samatthyato chaṭṭhyantato hotīti “chaṭṭhīyantā nāmasmā”ti sutte avuttampi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1470_1: tesaṃ ā+e+o vā honti yathākkamaṃ ṇānubandheti akārassa ākāro.
anya-e0807n:1470_5: Veti vasiṭṭhassā+paccaṃti vākyassa ca vasiṭṭhāpaccaṃti samāsassa ca vikappatthaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1473_0: Vuttatthā apaccasaddassa napuṃsakatthepi puttaputtīnaṃ dvinnampi vācako hoti.
anya-e0807n:1477_2: Ettha ca a+yuvaṇṇantābhāvā ā+e+onaṃ na vuddhi.
anya-e0807n:1477_4: Cittakotiādīsu pana saṃyogantattā “saṃyoge kvacī”ti kvaci na vuddhi.
anya-e0807n:1478_0: Vacchassā+paccanti viggayha pubbasuttena ṇapaccaye kate puna vacchassā+paccaṃti viggaho.
anya-e0807n:1480_0: Vacchādīhi apaccapaccayantehi gottādīhi ca saddehi ṇāna+ṇāyanapaccayā vā honti apacce. Vacchāno,
anya-e0807n:1482_0: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerappaccayā honti vā yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1482_5: Evaṃ bhāgineyyo, nādeyyo, anteyyo, āheyyo, kāpeyyo,
anya-e0807n:1489_0: Bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo, “yamhi gossa cā”ti yamhi ussa avaṅa akāralopapubbarūpāni.
anya-e0807n:1491_3: Dakkhassā+paccaṃ dakkhi, datti, doṇi, vāsavi, vāruṇi.
anya-e0807n:1493_0: Rājato ñño vā hota+pacce khatthiyajātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1495_0: Tijātiyaṃ apacce ya+iyā honti. Khattassā+paccaṃ khatyo khattiyo. Jātiyaṃ tveva, khatti.
anya-e0807n:1497_3: Jātiyaṃ tveva, mānavo, nassa ṇo, māṇavo.
anya-e0807n:1499_1: taṃ nāmasmā khattiyā apacce raññe ca ṇo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1499_2: Pañcālānaṃ apaccaṃ rājā vā pañcālo, kosalo, māgadho, okkāko.
anya-e0807n:1501_0: Kurusivīhi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1505_0: Tatiyantato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇo hoti,
anya-e0807n:1505_2: Phussena induyuttena lakkhitā puṇṇamāsī phussī ratti,
anya-e0807n:1505_4: maghāya induyuttāya lakkhitā puṇṇamāsī māghī, māgho.
anya-e0807n:1507_0: Seti paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ṇo hoti,
anya-e0807n:1507_3: Sugato devatā assa sogato, māhindo, yāmo, vāruṇo.
anya-e0807n:1507_5: Phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinīti phusso māso.
anya-e0807n:1509_0: Dutiyantato ta+madhīte taṃ jānātīti etesva+tthesu ṇo hoti ko ṇiko ca.
anya-e0807n:1509_1: Ettha casaddo ko caṇiko ca hotīti samuccino,
anya-e0807n:1509_4: vi+ā+karaṇanti vicchijja katayādesassi+kārassa “tadādesā tadīva bhavantī”ti ñāyā “sarāna”miccādinā ekāre yāgamadvittāni.
anya-e0807n:1509_8: dīnaṃ saka” iti sakāgamo. Kamako, padako, venayiko,
anya-e0807n:1509_11: Dvitaggahaṇaṃ ajjhenajānane ca visuṃ visuṃ paccayavidhānatthaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1513_0: Ti tannāme nivāse dese ṇo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1517_4: hetumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ tatiyā.
anya-e0807n:1519_0: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti,
anya-e0807n:1519_2: Udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, bādaro, pabbajo.
anya-e0807n:1521_1: Udake bhavo odako, oraso, jānapado, māgadho,
anya-e0807n:1523_0: Bhavatthe tano. Ajja bhavo ajjatano, svātano, hiyyatano. “Eona+ma vaṇṇe”ti eonaṃ a hoti.
anya-e0807n:1525_0: Bhavatthe ṇo tano ca. Ettha ṇakāro avayavo, nevā+nubandho. Purāṇo, purātano.
anya-e0807n:1527_0: Bhavatthe acco hoti. Amā=saha bhavo amacco.
anya-e0807n:1529_2: Evaṃ antimo, heṭṭhimo, uparimo, orimo, pārimo, pacchimo,
anya-e0807n:1531_20: evaṃ upari sutte dassitapaccayato visuṃ paccaye dassite iminā suttenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ya- gammo,
anya-e0807n:1531_21: yamhi akāralope pubbarūpaṃ rasso ca. Dibbo. Iya- udariyo, diviyo,
anya-e0807n:1533_0: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti. Sarade bhavo sāradiko divaso, sāradikā ratti.
anya-e0807n:1534_0: 27. Ta+massa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ
anya-e0807n:1535_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaṭṭhyatthe ṇiko hoti.
anya-e0807n:1535_6: Gandho paṇya+massa gandhiko, teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko,
anya-e0807n:1537_11: Ettha tyādyantasamudāyato anukaraṇattā vā taddhitassa abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā bahulaṃvidhānena vā paccayo.
anya-e0807n:1538_1: Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddha+mabhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati vahati jīvatiti
anya-e0807n:1539_4: Vātena kato ābādho vātito, semhiko, pittiko.
anya-e0807n:1539_13: Varatthāya baddho vārattiko, āyasiko, pāsiko, suttiko.
anya-e0807n:1539_14: Ghatena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ, goḷikaṃ, dadhikaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1539_16: Jālena hato hantīti vā jāliko, bālisiko.
anya-e0807n:1543_1: Mātito sambhūta+māgataṃvā+ti ettha “mātito ca bhaginiyaṃccho”ti “mātito”ti bhāgena ussa imhi vākyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1551_0: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi ida+micca+smiṃ atthe yo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1553_0: “Pitito mātito”ti tena tena suttanipāteneva ussa i.
anya-e0807n:1555_0: Mātuto ca pituto ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ ccho hoti.
anya-e0807n:1557_5: Na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paccekābhisambandhato visuṃ visuṃ mātāpitusaddehi tesaṃ mātāpitunnaṃ atthe paccayo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1559_0: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti. Mātu hito matteyyo, petteyyo.
anya-e0807n:1560_0: 40. Nindā+ññāta+ppa paṭibhāga rassa dayā saññāsu ko
anya-e0807n:1561_13: balībaddhā ca no ime”tyādipāṭhe “lopo”ti kapaccayalopena vā abhedopacārena vā daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1563_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca,
anya-e0807n:1563_7: upaḍḍhakāyo parimāṇa+massa upaḍḍhakāyikaṃ bimbohanaṃ. Pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1565_0: Yādīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhyatthe ttako hoti,
anya-e0807n:1567_0: Sabbato paṭhamantā yādīhi ca asseti chaṭṭhyatthe āvantu hoti,
anya-e0807n:1569_0: Kimhā paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhyatthe rati+rīva+rīvataka+rittakā honti.
anya-e0807n:1573_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe matto hoti.
anya-e0807n:1575_0: Pamāṇaṃ hoti āyāmo, saṃkhyāseso tu sabbato.
anya-e0807n:1577_0: Uddhamānavuttito taggho hoti matto ca. Jaṇṇu parimāṇa+massa jaṇṇutagghaṃ, jaṇṇumattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1579_0: Purisā ṇo hoti mattādayo ca. Puriso parimāṇa+massa porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ+purisatagghaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1581_1: Ubho aṃsā assa ubhayaṃ, dvayaṃ, tayaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1581_2: Aṃsasambandhena samudāye vidhi hotīti na ubhayādito bahuvacananti ce,
anya-e0807n:1581_3: “rāhuno siro” tyādo abhedepi bhedavivakkhāya labbhamānato bahuvacanaṃ hoteva.
anya-e0807n:1583_0: Satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti sattamyatthe ḍo hoti,
anya-e0807n:1583_3: taṃ ce sataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:1585_0: Ḍe pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1585_2: Tiṃsati adhikā asmiṃ satādiketi tiṃsasataṃ ekatiṃsasataṃ iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1585_3: Utyantāyanavuti adhikā asmiṃ satādiketi navutaṃsataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā. Īsantāya-
anya-e0807n:1585_4: cattālīsaṃ adhikā asmiṃ sate sahasse satasahasseti cattālīsasata+miccādi.
anya-e0807n:1587_0: Chaṭṭhiyantāye+kādasādikāya saṃkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā.
anya-e0807n:1587_1: Sā saṃkhyā pūriyate yena taṃ pūraṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1589_0: Mapaccaye pañcamo, pañcamī. Sattamo, sattamī. Aṭṭhamo, aṭṭhamī. Katimo, katimī iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1591_0: Satādīnaṃ mo ca antādeso i ca. Satassa pūraṇo satimo, sahassimo.
anya-e0807n:1593_5: “Catutthadutiyesve+saṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti nipātanā pūraṇatthe dvito tiyo dvissa du ca,
anya-e0807n:1595_0: “Sati byabhicāre visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ”ti ñāyā saṃkhyāto visesetuṃ “asahāye”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1603_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca ttādayo honti bahulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1603_1: Na sabbe paccayā sabbato honti aññatratta+tāhi.
anya-e0807n:1605_0: Nimittabhūtaṃ nāmañca, jāti dabbaṃ kriyā guṇoti.
anya-e0807n:1606_0: Nīlassa paṭassa bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatāti guṇo bhāvo.
anya-e0807n:1606_1: Ettha nīlaguṇavasena paṭe nīlasaddassa vuttiyā paṭabuddhiyā nimittaṃ bhāvo nāma.
anya-e0807n:1606_2: Nīlassa guṇassa bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatāti nīlaguṇajāti,
anya-e0807n:1606_3: ettha nīlaguṇajāti nimittaṃ hutvā nīlasaddassa guṇavuttiyā nīlaguṇajāti nimittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1606_5: ettha jātisaddānaṃ dabbavuttiyā sati jāti nimittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1606_8: Daṇḍittaṃ visāṇittaṃ rājapurisattaṃti daṇḍa+visāṇa+rājadabbānaṃ sambandhittaṃ bhāvo,
anya-e0807n:1608_0: Ttana-puthujjanattanaṃ. Vedanāya bhāvo vedanattanaṃ, rasso. Evaṃ jāyattanaṃ, jārattanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1609_10: Sakhino bhāvo sakhyaṃ, vāṇijjaṃ, ārogyaṃ, odagyaṃ, ānaṇyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1609_15: Muṭṭhassatissa bhāvo muṭṭhassaccaṃ, ilopo. Kosallaṃ, vepullaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1611_1: garūnaṃ bhāvo gāravaṃ, u avaṅa. Pāṭavaṃ, ajjavaṃ, maddavaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1612_0: Iya-adhipatino bhāvo adhipatiyaṃ, paṇḍitiyaṃ, bahussutiyaṃ, naggiyaṃ, sūriyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1613_0: Ṇiya-alasassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā ālasiyaṃ, tālusiyaṃ, mandiyaṃ, dakkhiyaṃ, porohitiyaṃ, veyyattiyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1614_3: tattha alasassa kammaṃ alasattaṃ alasatā alasattanaṃ ālasyaṃ ālasiyaṃ vā.
anya-e0807n:1616_5: tassa ce pubbarūpe ca kate “tadaminā”dinā nassa ñño ca lopo ca hoti,
anya-e0807n:1618_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā vaddhā dāsā ca byo hoti bhāvakammesu.
anya-e0807n:1618_1: Vaddhassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā vaddhabyaṃ, vaddhatā.
anya-e0807n:1618_2: Dāsassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā dāsabyaṃ, dāsyaṃ, dāsatā.
anya-e0807n:1620_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā yuvasaddā bhāvakammesu naṇa vā hoti vassa bo ca.
anya-e0807n:1622_0: Bhāve vā imo. Aṇuno bhāvo aṇimā, laghimā, mahato bhāvo mahimā. Kisassa bhāvo kasimā.
anya-e0807n:1624_0: Imamhi mahato maho ca kisassa kasādeso ca hoti.
anya-e0807n:1626_0: Kriyāvācakasaddato imo, pākena nibbattaṃ pākimaṃ, sekimaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1628_2: iminā īssa akāre ca tassa je ca kate yassa pubbarūpaṃ, kosajjaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1628_6: Parisāsu sādhūti vākye “ṇyo tattha sādhū”ti ṇyo,
anya-e0807n:1628_8: “byañjane dīgharassā”ti āssa rasse ca kate jassa pubbarūpaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1630_1: Atisayena pāpo pāpataro pāpatamo pāpissito pāpiyo pāpiṭṭho,
anya-e0807n:1632_2: jādese pubbasaralope luttā sarā issa ekāre ca yassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1634_4: pubbeva sare lutte issa e dvittañca.
anya-e0807n:1642_1: Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre+vayave ca ṇādayo honti bahulaṃ. Ṇa-
anya-e0807n:1642_3: Udumbarassa avayavo vikāro vā odumbaraṃ bhasmaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā.
anya-e0807n:1646_2: pallavitasseva pallavaṃ”ti vuttattā phalādayo avayavā vikārā ca honti,
anya-e0807n:1650_1: Janānaṃ samūho janatā, gajatā, bandhutā, gāmatā, sahāyatā, nāgaratā.
anya-e0807n:1651_2: dhūmo viya ācaratīti “kattutā+yo”ti āye “gamanatthākammakādhāre cā”ti ktapaccaye ūāgame ca kate dhūmāyitassa bhāvoti dhūmāyitattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1655_0: Hitatthe sso. Cakkhuno hitaṃ cakkhussaṃ, āyussaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1657_0: Sattamyantā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇyo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1659_0: Kammasaddā sādhvatthe niya+ññā honti. Kamme sādhu kammaniyaṃ kammaññaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1661_0: Iko. Kathāyaṃ kusalo kathiko. Dhammakathiko, saṅgāmiko, pavāsiko, upavāsiko.
anya-e0807n:1663_0: Ṇeyyo. Pathe hitaṃ pātheyyaṃ, sapatismiṃ hitaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ. Padīpeyyaṃ telaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1669_0: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthīti etesva+tthesu mantu hoti.
anya-e0807n:1669_1: Gāvo ettha dese assa vā purisassa santīti gomā,
anya-e0807n:1670_0: Atthīti vattamānakālopādānato bhūtāhi bhavissantīhi vā gohi na gomā.
anya-e0807n:1676_0: Vantu. Pasatthaṃ sīla+massa atthīti sīlavā. Pahutā pasatthā vā paññā assa atthīti paññavā.
anya-e0807n:1678_3: Niccayutto daṇḍo assa atthīti daṇḍiko daṇḍī.
anya-e0807n:1679_0: “Uttamiṇeva dhanā iko”ti gaṇasuttena iko dhaniko. Añño dhanī dhanavā.
anya-e0807n:1680_0: “Asannihite atthā” asannihito attho assa atthīti atthiko atthī.
anya-e0807n:1680_2: “Tadantā ca” puññattho assa atthīti puññatthiko puññatthī.
anya-e0807n:1681_0: “Vaṇṇantā īyeva”. Brahmavaṇṇaṃ assa atthīti brahmavaṇṇī, devavaṇṇī.
anya-e0807n:1682_0: “Hatthadantehi jātiyaṃ”. Hattha+massa atthīti hatthī, dantī. Aññatra hatthavā dantavā.
anya-e0807n:1683_0: “Vaṇṇato brahmacārimhi”. Vaṇṇo assa atthīti vaṇṇiko brahmacārī.
anya-e0807n:1684_1: Pokkharaṃ jalaṃ padumaṃ vā assa atthīti pokkharī,
anya-e0807n:1684_4: pokkharaṇī, uppalinī, kumudinī, bhisinī, mulālinī, sālukinī.
anya-e0807n:1687_0: “Sukhadukkhā ī”. Sukhī dukkhī. “Balā bāhūrupubbā ca”. Bāhubalī, ūrubalī.
anya-e0807n:1689_0: Ssī. Tapo assa atthīti tapassī, yasassī, tejassī, manassī, payassī. Vātveva, yasavā.
anya-e0807n:1691_7: Khaṃ=gīvāya vivaraṃ assa atthīti kharo gadrabho.
anya-e0807n:1692_0: “Dantassa ca unnatadante”ti gaṇasuttena dantassa u ca, unnataṃ danta+massa atthīti danturo.
anya-e0807n:1694_0: Bho vā. Tuṭṭhi assa atthīti tuṭṭhibho, sālibho, vālibho.
anya-e0807n:1696_0: Iti vā a hoti. Atisayā saddhā assa atthīti saddho, pañño, paññavā, saddhā kaññā, saddhaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1700_1: Abhijjhā assa atthīti abhijjhālu, sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu, dayāvā.
anya-e0807n:1702_1: Piccha+massa atthīti picchilo, picchavā. Pheṇilo, jaṭilo, tuṇḍilo.
anya-e0807n:1702_2: Ninditā vācā assa atthīti vācāloti parassaralopo.
anya-e0807n:1704_0: Vo hoti vā. Sīlavo, sīlavā. Kesavo, kesavā.
anya-e0807n:1705_1: “Gaṇḍīrājīhi saññāyaṃ” gaṇḍī=meṇḍasiṅgaṃ assa atthīti gaṇḍīvaṃ dhanu,
anya-e0807n:1711_0: Lakkhīsaddā ṇo hoti mantvatthe a ca+ntassa. Lakkhī assa atthīti lakkhaṇo.
anya-e0807n:1713_0: Aṅgasmā no hoti. Kalyāṇāni sobhaṇāni aṅgāni assā atthīti aṅganā.
anya-e0807n:1715_0: Lomā so, pahūtā lomā assa atthīti lomaso, lomasā kaññā.
anya-e0807n:1717_1: putto assa atthīti puttimo, kittimo, puttiyo, kappiyo, jaṭiyo,
anya-e0807n:1719_6: Evaṃ purisato, rājato, aggito, hatthito, hetuto, yuttito, itthito,
anya-e0807n:1721_0: Tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭa+eṭa kiṃ saddassa kuttañca.
anya-e0807n:1725_1: Ādo ādito, majjhato, antato, piṭṭhito, passato, mukhato.
anya-e0807n:1729_1: Sesādesā ca paccayā ca imināva nipaccante.
anya-e0807n:1731_0: Sabbasmā dhi vā. Sabbasmiṃ sabbadhi sabbatra.
anya-e0807n:1735_0: Tasaddā haṃ hoti hiñca. Tahaṃ tahiṃ tatra.
anya-e0807n:1737_0: Hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa ku+kā ca. Kuhiṃ kahaṃ. Kuhiñcanaṃti nipātantaraṃ.
anya-e0807n:1739_0: Etehi kāle dā hoti vā. Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā.
anya-e0807n:1741_0: Ete saddā nipaccante. Kasmiṃkāle kadā kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā idāni.
anya-e0807n:1743_0: Pakati paccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabba+metaṃ nipātanā labbhati.
