anya-e0807n:2014_3: ādo bhavissatissatyādo ca atthissa bhu hoti.
anya-e0807n:2016_0: Asa=bhuvi+ccasmā paresaṃ eyyādicchannaṃ sādayo honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2019_0: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Vuddhiavādese lassa lope bravīti.
anya-e0807n:2021_0: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūti. Uvaṅādese brūvanti.
anya-e0807n:2023_2: Atoyeva āhā paresaṃ tiantīnaṃ ṭaṭūvidhānañāpakā tiantīsu brūssa āho. Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi,
anya-e0807n:2029_6: aññatra “yavā sare”ti vakāro, juhvati. Juhonti. Juhvanti.
anya-e0807n:2029_9: “dīgho sarassā”ti dīghe hūyati tena aggi iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2030_1: pure viya dvebhāvachādesalope “rasso pubbassā”ti pubbassa āssa rasso.
anya-e0807n:2033_0: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṃ hoti vā mimesu.
anya-e0807n:2033_10: Lavikaraṇe dassati, dassanti. Ajjatane- adadi, adadiṃsu, adajji,
anya-e0807n:2033_18: “Ṭā”ti bahulādhikārā dajjādesā parassa eyyassa ṭā, dajjā,
anya-e0807n:2033_19: dajjuṃ dajjeyyaṃ dadeyyuṃ. Tvādīsu- dadātu, dadantu, dajjatu, dajjantu,
anya-e0807n:2034_1: tyādimhi caggahaṇena dvitte pubbākārassa rassatte lalope “catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti pubbadhakārassa dakāre ca kate dadhāti, dadhanti. Pipubbo,
anya-e0807n:2035_0: Bhūvādi ca juhādi ca, huvādidhātavo ci+me;
anya-e0807n:2038_0: Adhunā vikaraṇapabhedapakāsanatthaṃ rudhādīnaṃ aṭṭhagaṇānaṃ kānici rūpāni udāhariyante –
anya-e0807n:2041_0: Rudhādiko aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna+nta+tyādīsu lo hoti mañca+ntasarā paro.
anya-e0807n:2042_4: “labha vasacchidā” dinā cchaṅādese checchati chindissati. Kamme-
anya-e0807n:2043_2: Bhavissatimhi “bhuja+muca+vaca+visānaṃ kkhaṅa”ti dhātvantena saha ssassa kkhaṅādese vuddhi,
anya-e0807n:2044_0: Muca=mocane, muccati, muccanti iccādi. Kamme-muccati, muccanti iccādi. (Rudhādinayo).
anya-e0807n:2045_0: Diva=kīḷā vijigiṃsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu,
anya-e0807n:2049_4: janituṃ payojetīti “payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ce”ti ṇimhi “aññatrāpī”ti vuddhipaṭisedhe kyamhi “dīgho sarassā”ti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati,
anya-e0807n:2052_0: Tudādīhi kattari lavisaye ko hoti. Tudati,
anya-e0807n:2052_5: Tathā tudissati tujjissati. Atudi, atudiṃsu, atujji.
anya-e0807n:2061_0: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati,
anya-e0807n:2061_3: Kye “āsse cā”ti ettha “āsse”ti yogavibhāgā āssa e hoti,
anya-e0807n:2061_8: “kyassa sse”ti kyalope rasse ca kate ñāssati, ñāssanti,
anya-e0807n:2063_0: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme,
anya-e0807n:2065_0: Ñāto parassa eyyassa iyā+ñā honti vā. Jāniyā.
anya-e0807n:2067_0: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṃ vā hoti. Jaññā, jāneyya, jāneyyuṃ. Kamme-
anya-e0807n:2068_1: “ā ī ssādīnaṃ byañjanassiña” iti iñaiti yogavibhāgā iñāgame pubbasaralopo, mināti, minanti. Kamme-
anya-e0807n:2068_4: “kṇāknāsu rasso”ti dhātussa rasso, lunāti, lunanti. Kamme-
anya-e0807n:2075_0: Saka+āpānaṃ kuka+kuiccete āgamā honti ṇe. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Sakkunāti, sakkunanti.
anya-e0807n:2077_0: Sakasmā kṇāssa kkho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0807n:2079_0: Sakasmā kṇāssa kho vā hoti īādīsu.
anya-e0807n:2085_0: Tesu īādīsu suto paresaṃ kṇo+kṇānaṃ roṭa vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:2085_3: Ussa lope dvittaṃ īssa si ca. Assosi,
anya-e0807n:2085_11: Tena sūye sūyeyya. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Sūyatu,
anya-e0807n:2089_0: Tanādito kattari lavisaye o hoti. Kittiṃ tanoti, tanonti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2091_0: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakkavisaye. Tanute, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanvamhe. Kamme –
anya-e0807n:2093_0: Tanassa vā ā hoti kye. Papubbo, patāyati.
anya-e0807n:2096_0: Karassa sa okārassa kubbādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Kubbati, kubbanti. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha.
anya-e0807n:2098_0: Karassa sa okārassa kuṃ vā hoti mimesu.
anya-e0807n:2098_9: “Tavaggavaraṇā” dinā ye rassa yakāre kayyati, kayyanti.
anya-e0807n:2098_10: Bahulādhakārā kamme kvaci iminā kayirādese tena kayirati,
anya-e0807n:2100_0: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati,
anya-e0807n:2102_0: Karassa sa okārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu.
anya-e0807n:2104_0: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi.
anya-e0807n:2106_0: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0807n:2108_0: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṃ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṃ. Tvaṃ kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0807n:2110_0: Kayirā parasse+thassa ā hotītiādissa essa ā hoti.
anya-e0807n:2112_0: Pādito parassa karassa kvaci kha hoti.
anya-e0807n:2115_0: Curādīhi kriyatthehi sakatthe ṇi paro hoti.
anya-e0807n:2117_0: Bhūvādi ca rudhādi ca, divādi ca tudādayo;
anya-e0807n:2118_0: Jyādī kiyādī svādī ca, tanādī ca curādayo.
anya-e0807n:2121_1: vīmaṃsāyaṃ mānā ca kha+sapaccayā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2121_6: “Catutthadutiyā” dinā paṭhamakkharakakāre ca “khachasāna+mekassaro+di dve”ti tikkha tikkha iti dvibhāve
anya-e0807n:2121_7: “lopo+nādibyañjanassā”tiādito+ññassa byañjanassa lope ca kate titikkhādhātuto tyādipaccaya+lavikaraṇāni.
anya-e0807n:2122_1: dvittādimhi kate “mānassa vī parassa ca maṃ”ti pubbamānassa vī ca paramānassa mañca hoti.
anya-e0807n:2124_0: Tikicchāyaṃ saṃsaye ca vattamānā kitā cho hoti.
anya-e0807n:2124_2: chapaccaye pubbeva pararūpādimhi ca kate “kitassā+saṃsaye vā”ti dvitte pubbassa tiādese tikicchadhātuto tyādayo.
anya-e0807n:2124_5: Vipubbato kitā chappaccayādimhi kate “kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā”ti dvitte pubbassa kassa co.
anya-e0807n:2126_0: Nindāyaṃ gupa+badhehi cho hoti bassa bho ca.
anya-e0807n:2126_1: Gupa=rakkhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye “aññatrāpī”ti ottābhāve ca pararūpādimhi “kavaggahā” dinā gassa je
anya-e0807n:2126_2: ca kate “gupissussā”ti dvitte pubbassa ussa i hoti.
anya-e0807n:2126_4: badha=bandhane+tīmasmā chappaccaye ca imināva bassa bhakāre ca pararūpe paṭhamakkhare bhacchabhacchaiti
anya-e0807n:2126_5: dvitte anādibyañjanassa lope “catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti dvitte pubbassa bhassa bakāre “khachasesvassī”ti
anya-e0807n:2126_6: ikāre dīghe ca kate bībhacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n:2128_0: Tumantato icchāya+matthe te kha+sa+chā honti bahulaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2128_3: Bhojanāyāti viggayha “tuṃ+tāye”ccādinā tuṃpaccaye “lahussupantassā”ti okāre pararūpe ca kate bhottu+micchatīti
anya-e0807n:2128_4: viggayha iminā khapaccaye tuṃpaccayassa iminā ca lope “nimittābhāve nemittikassāpi ca abhāvo”ti ñāyā
anya-e0807n:2128_5: pararūpaokārānaṃ abhāve khassa pararūpa+khakārādimhi ca kate bhukkha bhukkha iti dvitte tatiyabakāro hoti,
anya-e0807n:2129_1: jayanāya iti viggayha pure viya tumādimhi kate jetu+micchatīti viggayha sappaccaye jisa jisa iti dvitte
anya-e0807n:2129_2: anādibyañjanalope dvitte parassa jissa “jiharānaṃ giṃ”ti giṃ.
anya-e0807n:2130_1: ghasitu+micchati chappaccayādimhi pure viya kate ghassa “kavaggahā”dinā jhe jhassa “catutthadutiyā” dinā
anya-e0807n:2130_2: jakāre “khachasesvassī”ti ikāre ca kate jighacchadhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n:2134_0: Kammato upamānā ācāratthe īyo hoti. Putta+mivā+carati puttīyati sissaṃ, puttīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2136_0: Īyo hoti. Kuṭiya+mivā+carati kuṭīyati pāsāde. Pāsādevā+carati pāsādīyati kuṭiyaṃ, pāsādīyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2140_1: Bhusoti paṭhamantato abhuso bhuso bhavatīti bhusāyati,
anya-e0807n:2140_3: “Vicchābhikkhaññesu dve”ti ābhikkhaññatthe dvitte apaṭapaṭā paṭapaṭā bhavatīti āye paṭapaṭāyati,
anya-e0807n:2142_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi karotīti asmiṃ atthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0807n:2144_0: Namoiccasmā karotīti asmiṃ atthe asso hoti.
anya-e0807n:2144_1: Namo karotīti asmiṃ atthe assapaccaye tyādayo honti,
anya-e0807n:2146_1: Hatthinā atikkamatīti ipaccaye lavikaraṇa+ekāra+ayādesesu katesu atihatthayati.
anya-e0807n:2150_0: Kattāraṃ yo payojeti, tassa byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi+ṇāpī honti bahulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2152_0: Dve dve+ko hoti vā sese, bahulaṃtyanuvuttiyā.
anya-e0807n:2155_0: Tasmā kattari kamme ca, ṇi+ṇāpīnaṃ tu sambhavo;
anya-e0807n:2156_0: Na bhāve suddhakattā tu, kammaṃ hoti payojake.
anya-e0807n:2159_3: Tyādimhi “ṇi+ṇāpyā+pīhi vā”ti lavikaraṇe ekāre “eona+mayavā sare”ti ayādeso.
anya-e0807n:2160_1: So devadattena odanaṃ pācayati pāceti iccādi,
anya-e0807n:2160_3: so tena devadattena odano pācīyati pācāpīyati+ccādi,
anya-e0807n:2161_0: Gantuṃ payojetīti atthe so taṃ purisaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati gameti gacchāpayati gacchāpeti+ccādi. Kamme-
anya-e0807n:2162_0: Guha=saṃvaraṇe, guhituṃ payojetīti ṇimhi “guhissa sare”ti dīgho. Gūhayati, gūhayanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2163_0: Disa+dusa=appītiyaṃ, dusituṃ payojetīti ṇimhi “ṇimhi dīgho dusassā”ti dīghe dūsayati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2172_0: “Tijamānehi khasā khamāvīmaṃsāsu” iccādīhi paccayavidhānañca pararūpadvittādikāriyañca tyādikaṇḍe vuttanayeneva ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2172_2: “itthiya+maṇaktikayakayā ca” iti suttena apaccayo ca “itthiya+matvā”ti āpaccayo ca hoti.
anya-e0807n:2172_4: “Kitā tikicchāsaṃsayesu cho”ti chappaccayādimhi kate tikicchanaṃ tikicchā,
anya-e0807n:2172_7: badha=bandhaneti imehi dhātūhi “nindāyaṃ gupa+badhā bassa bho ca” iti chapaccayādimhi ca dvitte parabakārassa iminā bhakāre ca kate apaccayādi hoti.
anya-e0807n:2172_10: “Tuṃsmā lopo ci+cchāyaṃ te” iti icchāya+matthe kha+sa+chappaccayā honti.
anya-e0807n:2177_2: abhibhūyate abhibhūyittha abhibhūyissateti abhibhavitabbo kodho paṇḍitena,
anya-e0807n:2179_0: Napuṃsake siyuṃ bhāve, kto cā+no akattari.
anya-e0807n:2180_0: Bhāvasmiṃ ghaṇa pume evaṃ, iyuvaṇṇā gahādijo;
anya-e0807n:2182_0: Ito paraṃ upasaggapubbatā ca kālattayassa vākyagahaṇañca vuttanayena ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2183_17: ññimhi nāgame “tathanarānaṃ ṭaṭhaṇalā”ti ṇe ca kate “na te kānubandha+nāgamesū”ti okārābhāvo.
anya-e0807n:2185_0: Kriyatthāna+mantabyañjanassa pararūpaṃ hoti yakārato aññasmiṃ byañjane.
anya-e0807n:2187_0: Tumādīsu karassā hoti vā. Kātabbaṃ hitaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2189_0: Rantato kriyatthā paccayanakārassa ṇa hoti. Karaṇīyo.
anya-e0807n:2190_2: Gaha=upādāne “maṃ vā rudhādīnaṃ”ti antasarā paromaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:2190_10: “sakāpānaṃ kukakū ṇe”ti ettha ‘sakāpānaṃ kuka+kū’ti yogavibhāgā ku,
anya-e0807n:2190_11: ūāgame nāgamassa ṇe ca kate pāpīyatīti pāpuṇitabbo.
anya-e0807n:2193_1: “curādito ṇī”ti ṇimhi ñukārassa guruttā okārāvutti “yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye”ti ekāre pūjetabbo ūmhi ayādese pūjayitabbo pūjanīyo bhagavā.
anya-e0807n:2196_0: Bhāvakammesu kriyatthā paro ghyaṇa hoti bahulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2196_7: “vaggalasehi te”ti pubbarūpabhakāre “catutthadutiyā” dinā tatiyakkhare ca kate labhitabbaṃ labbhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2199_0: Ghānubandhe cakāra+jakārantānaṃ kriyatthānaṃ ka+gā honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2201_0: Ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare upantassa akārassa ā hoti.
anya-e0807n:2203_0: Nito parassa cissa cho hotītiādicakārassa cho.
anya-e0807n:2205_0: Ākārantato kriyatthā ghyaṇa hoti bhāvakammesu āssa e ca. Dā=dāne,
anya-e0807n:2205_6: ūmhi nāgamo “ñāssa ne+jā”ti ñāssa jādese jānitabbaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2207_0: Vadādīhi kriyatthehi yo hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakammesu.
anya-e0807n:2210_0: Lahubhūtassa upantassa iyuvaṇṇassa eo honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2212_2: iminā nipātanā ye kicādese ca kate pubbarūpaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2212_5: ghaccādesādimhi kate hananaṃ haññateti vā ghaccaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2212_9: yamhi okāre iminā avādese bhavatīti bhabbo.
anya-e0807n:2212_11: yamhi iminā hassa yakāre lehitabbaṃ leyyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2216_0: Sāsassa sisa vā hoti kānubandhe. Pubbarūpaṃ, sāsīyatīti sisso.
anya-e0807n:2217_3: Atisaggo nāma “ki+midaṃ mayā kattabbaṃ”ti puṭṭhassa “pāṇo na hantabbo”tiādinā paṭipattidassanamukhena kattabbassa anuññā.
anya-e0807n:2217_8: Bhotā khalu kaṭo kattabbo karaṇīyo kāriyo kicco” evaṃ tvayā kaṭo kattabbo,
anya-e0807n:2218_0: Evaṃ uddhamuhuttepi vattamānato pesādīsu siddhā eva.
anya-e0807n:2218_1: Tathā arahe kattari sattivisiṭṭhe ca patīyamāne,
anya-e0807n:2220_21: “Manānaṃ niggahītaṃ”ti massa niggahīte vaggante ca gacchatīti gantā.
anya-e0807n:2222_5: “Adhātussa kā+syādito ghe+ssī”ti ghe pare assa iādeso,
anya-e0807n:2224_6: āssa rasse nakārāgame ca “ñāssa ne jā”ti jādeso, jānanako. Ṇāpimhi –
anya-e0807n:2226_0: Bahulaṃvidhānā kammepi-pādehi harīyatīti pādahārako. Cupa=mandagamane, gale cuppatīti galacopako.
anya-e0807n:2227_0: Siddhova ltu arahādīsu “bhavaṃ khalu kaññāya pariggahāraho”ti (pariggahitā). Sīlatthe-
anya-e0807n:2227_4: ettha “dhātvatthe nāmasmī”ti imhi ūāgame e+ayādese muṇḍayitusaddamhi āraṅādese ca kate yossa ṭo.
anya-e0807n:2231_0: Āsiṃsāyaṃ gammamānāyaṃ kriyatthā ako hoti kattari.
anya-e0807n:2233_0: Karato kattari ṇa no hoti. Karotīti kāraṇaṃ. Kattarīti kiṃ, karoti anenāti karaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2235_0: Hāto vīhismiṃ kāle ca ṇano hoti.
anya-e0807n:2237_0: Vidasmā kū hoti kattari. Kakāro “kūto”ti visesanattho. Vidatīti vidū, lokavidū.
anya-e0807n:2239_0: Vipubbā ñāicca+smā kū hoti kattari. Vijānātīti viññū.
anya-e0807n:2241_0: Kammato parā ñāicca+smā kū hoti kattari.
anya-e0807n:2243_0: Kammato parā kriyatthā kvaci aṇa hoti kattari.
anya-e0807n:2246_0: Kammato parā gamā rū hoti kattari. Rānubandhattā amabhāgalopo. Vedaṃ gacchatīti vedagū, evaṃ pāragū.
anya-e0807n:2249_0: Samānādīhi yādīhi co+pamānehi parā disā kammakārake rī+rikkha+kā honti.
anya-e0807n:2249_1: “Syādi syādine+katthaṃ”ti samāse “rānubandhe+ntasarādissā”ti disassa isabhāgalope “rīrikkhakesū”ti samānassa sādese ca samāno viya dissatīti sadī, sadikkho. Ke –
anya-e0807n:2251_0: Samānasaddato parassa disassa ra hoti vā rī+rikkha+kesūti pakkhe dassa rādese sarī, sarikkho, sariso.
anya-e0807n:2253_0: Rī+rikkha+kesu sabbādīna+mā hoti. Añño viya dissatīti aññādī, aññādikkho, aññādiso.
anya-e0807n:2257_2: ayaṃ viya dissatīti tādī mādī iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2259_0: Rīrikkhakantato+ññasmiṃ uttarapade tumhāmhāna+mekasmiṃ taṃ+maṃ honti yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2259_2: ahaṃ dīpo esaṃti aññapadatthe taṃdīpā maṃdīpā.
anya-e0807n:2261_0: Rī+rikkha+kesu etassa eṭa vā hoti. Edī etādī, edikkho etādikkho, ediso etādiso.
anya-e0807n:2263_0: Bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā a ghaṇa gha kā honti bahulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2264_13: Āto “parokkhāyañcā”ti caggahaṇena dvitte “rasso pubbassā”ti rasse ca annaṃ dadātīti annadado,
anya-e0807n:2264_18: vinesi vineti vinessati etena etthāti vā vinayo,
anya-e0807n:2271_0: Gha-vacatīti vako. Sica=paggharaṇe, secanaṃ seko. Evaṃ soko, eovuddhiyo. Yuñjanaṃ yogo.
anya-e0807n:2274_11: Sammā samaṃ vā cittaṃ ādadhātīti samādhi.
anya-e0807n:2278_0: Kriyatthā kvi hoti bahulaṃ bhāvakārakesu. Kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho.
anya-e0807n:2282_3: anandīyittha nandīyati nandīyissati nanditabbanti vā nandanaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2282_17: “sakāpānaṃ kuka+kū”ti yogavibhāgā kuāgame nāgame ca tassa ṇo ca.
anya-e0807n:2283_21: Tathā bhāveti bhāvīyati etāyāti vā bhāvanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2284_0: Adhikaraṇe-tiṭṭhati asinti ṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sayanaṃ, senaṃ vā āsanaṃ. Adhikarīyati etthāti adhikaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2285_4: calati sīlenāti calano evaṃ jalano, kodhano, kopano.
anya-e0807n:2287_0: Itthiliṅge bhāve kārake ca kriyatthā aādayo honti ano ca bahulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2292_0: Ka-guhantī etthāti guhā, okāranivutti. Rujatīti rujā. Modanti etāyāti mudā nāma muditā.
anya-e0807n:2293_0: Yaka-vida=ñāṇe, vidanaṃ vidanti etāyāti vā vijjā, dassa je pubbarūpaṃ. Yajanaṃ ijjā, ṭiādeso.
anya-e0807n:2294_3: samajanaṃ samajanti etthāti vā samajjā. Papubbo,
anya-e0807n:2297_0: Jā=vayohānimhi, hā=cāge, imehi itthiyaṃ ni hoti. Jānaṃ=vayaparipāko jāni. Hānaṃ hāni.
anya-e0807n:2301_3: “Karotissa kho”ti vikaraṇassa ñāpitattā “kattari lo”ti lo, pacati.
anya-e0807n:2303_4: Atha vā piyaṃ pasaṃsati sīlena vā dhammena vā tasmiṃ sādhu vāti piyapasaṃsī,
anya-e0807n:2304_3: “Syādi syādine+katthaṃ”ti samāse vibhattilope ca kate “lopo”ti niggahītalopo.
anya-e0807n:2304_4: Satandāyīti ettha bahulaṃvidhānā vibhattialope amādisamāsapaṭisedhe ca kate vaggantaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2306_0: Sādhukaraṇaṃ sādhukāro, so assa atthīti sādhukārīti ghaṇantā ī.
anya-e0807n:2308_1: Iminā nipātanā varapaccayo ca thāssa tho ca,
anya-e0807n:2308_7: bhajjate sayameva bhajjati vā attanā attānanti bhaṅguro,
anya-e0807n:2308_9: Bhijjate sayameva bhindati vā attānanti bhidūro,
anya-e0807n:2310_0: Bhūte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ktavantu+ktāvī honti kattari.
anya-e0807n:2312_0: Bhāve kamme ca bhūte kto hoti.
anya-e0807n:2315_0: 58. Ṭhā+sa vasa silisa sī ruha jara janīhi
anya-e0807n:2316_12: Adhisayi adhisīyitthāti vā adhisayito khaṭopikaṃ bhavaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2316_14: Evaṃ āruhi āruhīyitthāti vā āruḷho rukkhaṃ bhavaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2316_16: “ruhādīhi ho ḷa cā”ti tassa hakāro pubbahakārassa ca ḷo.
anya-e0807n:2316_17: Anujīri anujīrīyitthāti vā anujiṇṇo vasaliṃ bhavaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2316_19: “tarādīhi riṇṇo”ti ktassa riṇṇādeso “rānubandhe”tyādinā arabhāgassa lopo ca.
anya-e0807n:2316_20: Anvajāyi anvajāyitthāti vā anujāto māṇavako māṇavikaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2318_0: Gamanatthato akammakato ca kriyatthā ādhāre kto hoti kattari ca yathāpattañca.
anya-e0807n:2318_10: te gatyatthā”ti vuttattā tathalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvato āgato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato itipi hoti.
anya-e0807n:2321_0: Kaṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ āpannoti phalabhūte dukkhe kaṭṭhasaddassa vattanato phalassa bhāvittā bhūteyeva kto.
anya-e0807n:2323_0: Bhidādīhi paresaṃ kta+ktavantūnaṃ tassa no hoti.
anya-e0807n:2323_14: tassa “ṇiṇāpīnaṃ tesū”ti ettha “ṇi” iti yogavibhāgā lopo.
anya-e0807n:2325_0: Dāto kta+ktavantūnaṃ tassa inno hoti. Adāyitthāti dinno. Addīti dinnavā.
anya-e0807n:2329_6: Ettha cissa vikappavidhānattā pana paricita+upacitādayopi siddhā eva.
anya-e0807n:2331_2: “Gamanatthā” dinā kattari ktapaccaye tassa iminā gakāre pararūpaṃ niggahītalopo ca.
anya-e0807n:2333_0: Susato paresaṃ kta+ktavantūnaṃ tassa kho hoti. Susa=sose. Sussīti sukkho sukkhavā.
anya-e0807n:2335_0: Pacā paresaṃ kta+ktavantūnaṃ tassa ko hoti. Paccīti pakko. Pacīti pakkavā.
anya-e0807n:2337_0: Mucā paresaṃ kta+ktavantūnaṃ tassa ko vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:2339_0: Muha+bahānaṃ duhissa ca dīgho hoti takārādo kānubandhe tvāna+tvāvajjite.
anya-e0807n:2339_4: “gamanatthā” dinā akammakattā kattari kte dīgho “ruhādīhi ho ḷa cā”ti tassa ho ca hassa ḷo ca hoti.
anya-e0807n:2341_0: Vahassa ussa dīgho hoti te. Vuyhitthāti vūḷho, “assū”ti ukāre iminā dīgho.
anya-e0807n:2343_0: Dhā=dhāraṇe+timassa hi hoti vā te. Nidhīyitthāti nihito. Nidahīti nihitavā nihitāvī.
anya-e0807n:2345_0: Gamādīnaṃ rakārantānañca antassa lopo hoti te.
anya-e0807n:2347_0: Vacādīnaṃ vassa uṭa vā hoti kānubandhe atve.
anya-e0807n:2347_5: vasanaṃ avasi vasiṃsu etthāti vā utthaṃ vutthaṃ,
anya-e0807n:2347_7: “sāsa vasa saṃsa saṃsā tho”ti tassa tho.
anya-e0807n:2349_0: Vaddhassa assa vā u hoti kānubandhe atve.
anya-e0807n:2351_0: Yajassa yassa ṭi+yī honti kānubandhe atve.
anya-e0807n:2351_2: “pucchādito”ti tassa ṭhe pararūpādimhi kate iṭṭhaṃ yiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2353_0: Ṭhāssa i hoti kānubandhe atve. Aṭṭhāsīti ṭhito.
anya-e0807n:2355_0: Gā+pāna+mī hoti kānubandhe atve. Gānaṃ gītaṃ. Pānaṃ pītaṃ. Bahulādhikārā pitvā.
anya-e0807n:2357_0: Janissa ā hoti kānubandhe atve. Ajanīti jāto, “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti antassa ā hoti.
anya-e0807n:2359_2: tassa “sāsa vasa saṃsa sasā tho”ti the pararūpaṃ paṭhamakkharo ca,
anya-e0807n:2361_0: Sakārantā kriyatthā parassā+nantarassa tassa ṭha hoti.
anya-e0807n:2361_2: “gamanatthā” dinā kte iminā tassa ṭhe pararūpādi.
anya-e0807n:2363_0: Kasasmā parassā+nantarassa tassa ṭha hoti kasassa vā ima ca.
anya-e0807n:2365_0: Ete saddā nipaccante. Dhaṃsa+dhaṃsane, dhaṃsīyitthāti dhasto, bindulopo. Utrasīti otrasto.
anya-e0807n:2371_0: Dhakāra hakāra bhakārantehi parassa tassa dha hoti.
anya-e0807n:2371_1: Vaddhitthāti kamme kte tassa dhakārādimhi ca “vaddhassa vā”ti ukāre kate saṃyogādilopo, vuddho.
anya-e0807n:2375_0: Bahā parassā+nantarassa tassa ḍha hoti bahassu+ma ca ḍhasanniyogena.
anya-e0807n:2377_0: Ruhādīhi parassā+nantarassa tassa ha hoti ḷo ca+ntassa.
anya-e0807n:2379_0: Ktatassa hakāro antassa vā ḷo ca. Amohīti muḷho, muddho, tassa dho. (Atītakālikapaccayavidhānaṃ).
anya-e0807n:2381_0: Vattamānatthe vattamānato kriyatthā nto hoti kattari.
anya-e0807n:2385_2: “Kyo bhāvakammesva+parokkhesu māna+nta+tyādīsū”ti bhāve kamme ca kyo.
anya-e0807n:2387_0: Anāgate atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tentamānā ssapubbā honti,
anya-e0807n:2387_5: Assa tyādivisayattā “āīssā” dinā iña na hoti,
anya-e0807n:2389_0: Rantato paresaṃ nta+māna+tyādīnaṃ nassa ṇo na hoti. Karotīti karonto kurumāno, “tanāditvo”ti o.
anya-e0807n:2391_0: Etesaṃ vā cchaṅa hoti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Ṅa-
anya-e0807n:2395_0: Ṭhāpānaṃ tiṭṭhapivā honti vā ntādīsu. Tiṭṭhanto, tiṭṭhamāno. Pivanto pivamāno.
anya-e0807n:2397_0: Gamādīnaṃ ghammādayo vā honti ntādīsu. Ghammanto gacchanto, vajjanto vadanto, dajjanto dadanto.
anya-e0807n:2399_0: Karassa saokārassa kubbādayo vā honti ntādīsu.
anya-e0807n:2399_3: Aññatra “mānassa massā”ti mānassa massa lope karāṇo.
anya-e0807n:2401_0: Gahassa vā gheppo hoti ntādīsu. Gheppanto gheppamāno.
anya-e0807n:2403_0: Gahassa niggahītassa ṇo hoti, “maṃ vā rudhādīnaṃ”ti maṃ, gaṇhitabbaṃ, gaṇhituṃ, gaṇhanto.
anya-e0807n:2409_0: 61. Tuṃ tāye tave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ
anya-e0807n:2410_0: Bhavissatiatthe vattamānato kriyatthā bhāve tumādayo honti kriyāyaṃ tadatthāyaṃ patīyamānāyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2410_14: “manānaṃ niggahītaṃ”ti niggahītaṃ. Gamituṃ, khantuṃ, khanituṃ, hantuṃ, hanituṃ, mantuṃ, manituṃ, harituṃ,
anya-e0807n:2413_0: Alamatthepi siddhaṃ, alameva dānāni dātuṃ, alameva puññāni kātuṃ.
anya-e0807n:2415_0: Alaṃ+khalusaddānaṃ paṭisedhanatthānaṃ payoge ktunādayo vā honti bhāve.
anya-e0807n:2415_3: alaṃ savanaṃ katvā khalu savanaṃ katvāti alaṃ sotuna khalu sotuna alaṃ sutvāna khalu sutvāna alaṃ sutvā khalu sutvā.
anya-e0807n:2417_9: Tathā sibbitvā chādayitvā jānitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sutvāna dhammaṃ modati, suṇitvā,
anya-e0807n:2417_15: vihāraṃ kāretvā kārayitvā kārāpetvā kārāpayitvā saggaṃ gamissanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2417_19: atikkamma pabbataṃ nadī”tiādīsu bhūdhātussa sambhavā ekakattukatā pubbakālatā ca gamyate.
anya-e0807n:2423_0: Tvāssa vā tuṃ+yānā honti samāse kvaci.
anya-e0807n:2423_9: Aññatra “disā vāna+vā sa cā”ti tvāssa vāna+vā sa honti, disvā.
anya-e0807n:2423_10: Evaṃ labhanaṃ katvā laddhā dhanaṃtiādīsu tassa dho bhavati.
anya-e0807n:2430_0: Te me jayanti guravo guravo guṇehi.
anya-e0807n:2433_0: Moggallāno mahāpañño, jayatī so ha sabbadā.
anya-e0807n:2463_1: Yathāvuttānaṃ pana payogasiddhinigamana gāthānaṃ ekādasannaṃ pubbeyeva vakkhamānā imā gāthāyo dissanti porāṇe sīhaḷamūlapayogasiddhipāṭhe.
